name: Diver UP Camp
description: We bring to you this year, The Wheel of Consciousness.

name: Camp DOA Champagne Bar
description: Black Rock City's premier champagne and wine tasting venue, featuring Italian tasting classes, the annual French Bistro Afternoon French rose' and Gypsy Swing wine tasting event, the annual Champagne Toast To The Man and much more. Come visit us and make new friends and relax!

name: Arctic Animal Antics Association
description: Come meet the *coolest* animals on playa. We welcome critters of all sorts however you identify! Come climb our Igloo to get a better view at those Northern Lights- If you aren't a climber, it's a cozy *chill* spot inside. Keep your eyes peeled, you might see some flying fur from our Arctic Animal Acrobats & Aerialists! We also like to light things on fire to stay warm in the arctic! So bring your fire toys and let's flow! We've got antics of all kinds- so check the schedule for special events.

name: Playa Penthouse
description: Elevated, restful, shady platform, from which to view the entire Playa. Lively discussions about life and relationships. Coffee in the mornings, cocktails in the evenings. Dance parties day and night. Our interior chill space/playpen is perfect midday or midnight. People from all over the world come to share experiences or simply enjoy our view in silence. "Our view doesn't suck"! We are the home of the Eros Tangier this year. Informal discussions all week on topics as varied and vital as "Living The 10 Principles", "Couples Communication", "Self-acceptance in sexual transition", "Finding a safe space for partners to express and discuss fantasies" and "Do not fear". We're not real doctors, but many claim we are.

name: Hiburnia
description: Hiburnia - Sunset/Sunrise Hot Toddies and Fruit Tea

name: Old Dusty Farts
description:
VIEWING TOWER, SHADE STRUCTURE, BAR, and a lot of shenanigans going on.
Come sit cool off have a refreshment and you will be asked to play some stupid game.

name: Bad Boy's Discover Your Kinks
description: Introductions to BDSM for the Vanilla but Curious and those new to the Kink community

name: Ohm Home
description: Home of Ohm Kar and other Mutants. Phat beats, Mutant Vehicles and good times.

name: Camp ASL Support Services HUB
description:
Sign language interpreters on playa referral pre event event week  post event and late hours interpreting 
Deaf culture share and ASL curious central hub

name: Dragons of Eden
description: The home of the "Dragons of Eden" and "Nova". :-)

name: Kuker Camp
description:
BULGARIAN KUKER Mutant Vehicle is based on a millenia old tradtion from the Balkan Peninsula in Europe, the Kukeri Ritual Dancers - people dressing up with hideous animalistic masks and elaborate self-made fur costumes every year at the beginning of Spring season to scare away evil spirits and bring joy, happiness and prosperity for the whole village throughout the year.
In addition to just having the festive and carnival-like appearance, we have infused our ancient MUTANT PET with a modern soul - mixing ancient bagpipe melodies and live drum beats with various electronic music styles.
Our main collaborators are the GroundSwell Foundation non-profit entity and Shady Lady camp of McMurdo's Antarctica burners.

name: Porta Party
description: Porta Party is celebrates diversity in culture, music and food. We are home to the remote controlled Porta John, Hel's Diner and a Can O WhoopAss. We serve potstickers everyday 6pm-8pm.

name: Cotton Candy Vibes
description: Cotton Candy Vibes has cotton candy and and vibes to match. Come by for chill fluffy lounge experience and if your are lucky cotton candy to match. We will also be doing random cotton candy delivery out to sound camps of our choice.

name: High Desert Cinema
description: High Desert Cinema is a place to kick back and relax before you hit the playa for the night. Everyone is welcome! We serve hot buttered popcorn you can smell a block away, and full-sized theater candy to munch on while you're watching one of our movies. We have a massive 12' x 15' screen with an awesome sound system you'll love. There are couches, bean bags and plenty of comfy chairs to kick back in.  We also offer water bottle fill-ups to those that need it.  So after a long hot & dusty day in the sun, come kick back with us before you hit the playa for the night. We promise to treat you right!

name: Camp Shutterbuggy
description: Camp Shutterbuggy is home base for our mobile photo booth art car in the shape of an antique camera. Join us nightly for Snappy Hour at 9pm, have a cocktail, get a souvenir photo, and then hop aboard for a playa art tour! We depart at 11pm each night. Everyone is welcome until we are full.

name: Knot Sure
description: Black light chill space, rope suspensions and decorative rope tops that people can keep.

name: Hushville Free Library
description: Free books! We are returning with fascinating books from a diverse range of topics. Our strengths are popular science writing (no textbooks), sci fi, fantasy, erotica, oddities, best sellers, and many things you don't expect to find elsewhere (or maybe anywhere else).

name: The Chapel of Dusty Nuptials
description: At The Chapel of Dusty Nuptials we want to help you make the best or worst decision of your Burn. From heartfelt to regrettable, from cosmic to playful, we offer wedding ceremonies to anyone who wants to tie the knot. Come get ordained and perform your own ceremonies too! We'll offer daily nuptials to whoever wants to get hitched! And just in case, we'll also offer daily annulments. Wanna get married? We can help!

name: Orgy Bus Camp
description: Orgy Bus Camp provides a safe and clean space for poly play parties on the playa. All of our parties have an opening ceremony where we practice consent and boundaries, as well as a fun opportunity to meet other guests. Our parties are at 3 PM and 10 PM daily.

name: Burner Brown
description: Burner Brown is a camp to strap on a comfy cock and work out that BDE.  Cock fighting throughout the week with a chaotic bar, bangin' dj's, and a dildo ring toss to test your "lowering down on it" abilities.  Afternoon parties are our specialty.  We make janky look good!

name: Camp Beacon
description:
Please come join us in our afternoon camp.   When the sun is hot and you want a place to relax, get a cold drink, meet people, listen to great DJ music, and learn about tarot and origami, we are ready to host you.   

And if you are a DJ yourself and would like to work out your sets on our equipment, we offer that as well.   Please come play with us!!!

name: Bubble Camp
description: Bubbles, bubbles everywhere and drops to drink for all. Dispensing thai iced tea and cold pressed coffee for all you parched playa peeps.

name: Motherprisms' Mad House
description:
Love Halloween?  Then come join us at the best haunt on the playa.

If you dust off your Halloween costume and join us, we will have sealed candy for you.

Open Monday through Friday, 7 pm to 12 am.

name: GloryWhole
description: TBD

name: Sake To Me
description: Sake To Me - your friendly playa servers of various chilled and flavored sake. There's plenty of sake and chill in our shaded, cushion-ish area, plus giant jenga fun for all ages!

name: Feed tHE ARTists
description: Started in 2007 with Larry Harvey's blessing and support, FTA has fed tens of thousands of artists, musicians, dancers, builders, makers, dabblers, and generally curious wandering travelers. FTA actively models the concept of creating community through the sharing of delicious meals at BRC and all over the world. We are striving to elevate food to an ART FORM, serving as a primary resource for playa food safety, kitchen design, and unforgettable cooking. You never know what we'll be cooking up next - and, whatever it may be, you are invited to prepare it with us and share a meal of some of the finest food ever gifted on the playa!

name: Cosmic Owl Literary Society
description: Attention ALL Burners - how would you like to collaborate with fellow Burners to write a short story? The Cosmic Owl Collobarative Literary Society is hosting two story boards at their camp. We will provide a prompt and then ask YOU to add a sentence to our short story. Every participant will receive a genuine Cosmic Owl Writer's Certificate. Its easy, its fun and YOU can be part of a creative project with your fellow Burners. All are welcome. You don't need any writing skills. Just your imagination! If you are not sure what to write, come by anyway and we will help you brainstorm ideas. All languages welcome. You can also come by later and see the finished version of the story, that you helped create or see it on our website. The Cosmic Owl welcomes you!

name: Pretty Pickle Camp
description: A relaxed and welcoming outpost on the dusty road to nowhere. We have daily afternoon pickle service (Noon to 2 pm Monday through Saturday). Cold pickles and pickletini shots! We invite passersby to step under our shade, enjoy a refreshing treat, and ride our disco pickle swing! In-the-know visitors may inquire about our playa-famous pickle warmers!

name: Elemental Studios
description:
At Elemental Studios, you don't need a Multi Pass to join in our camp's love of the movie Fifth Element. We invite all visitors (humanoid or none) to participate in our unique and 'Super Green' workshops. Each day is dedicated to an element; Fire, Water, Earth, Wind, Air and Love. Come relax under our shaded structure and light up humanity with your amazing creation. Instructions may be in the Divine Language. All materials provided while supplies last. Bevies available. Come for the art, stay for the community! 

Heart Leeloo & Korben Dallas

name: Parks and Wrecked!
description: Come play with us at Parks & Wrecked! We have the Playa's finest swim-up ball pit bar. Slide into the pit and climb on our playground! Enjoy fine libations! Listen to sweet boppin tunes! Come park your butt and we'll do the wreckin'!

name: Cosmic Dancer
description: We are a collective of artists, performers & healers offering Aerial & Yoga classes, Meditation, Ecstatic Dance and Community Events.

name: Lil Fuk n Dumplings
description: N/A

name: Gypsy Nebula Carnival
description:
Gypsy Nebula Carnival welcomes you! 
Enjoy shaved ice, or gourmet cotton candy and adopt a mutant monkey, play games, and win prizes. You can ride the biggest cock on the playa or go for a rowdy romp on the Bucking Beaver. The Gypsymonkey lounge is shady during the day and black-lighted at night and always welcomes the weary traveler to rest and enjoy our ambiance and snark.
Make sure to join us for our nightly happy hour at 5:00

name: Deep Ohm
description: Home of Burnie the mutant vehicle

name: Metal Trolls
description: Heavy music, games and events. Headbang with fellow trolls. Come jam with the band.

name: DragonCamp Armory
description:
This is a HIGHLY participatory workshop where women will learn to make and decorate their own sexy Armor Bikini to keep, wear, and share on the Playa. Recyclable aluminum is used to hand hammer a custom fit costume using traditional hand metal working techniques used for props in films and television. Patterns are provided in a variety of sizes. The thin sheet aluminum is cut by hand and then pounded into custom form at our special work stations. When done, the armor can be decorated by the girls with various baubles, bangles and jewelry bits which we supply. Bikinis are secured with sturdy thong.
Animatronic Dinosaurs and Dragons provide a lively background.

name: Ride I-Ching,-Ride
description: Our provides a guided I-Ching oracle experience. Come in for a reading a check in with yourself to see how well you are balanced with your life and the universe. Readings take nearly an hour. Pedicab rides will be available contingent upon the driver arriving upon the Playa.

name: Camp Shoshana
description: Camp Shoshana brings roses to the Playa. If you like roses and sees the world in rose colored glasses, our camp has a place for you to rest, recharge, listen to music, enjoy our rose garden art, and enjoy our rose-infused common space.

name: BatCave
description: BatCave is bringing back its gift of artisan lemonade!  Come join us Monday-Friday from noon-3pm for alcohol free lemonade and stay to hang out in our comfy Bat Roost.  We will be serving up unique flavors each day and they will always come with ice.

name: Lingerie Lounge
description: We will adorn you and adore you, fulfilling all your lingerie and costume needs! We have a huge inventory of hand-picked, sewn and dyed items, and our attentive camp members will find just the right item for you. Come see us for lingerie and other fabulous and festive items! We serve all sizes, ages, genders, gender identities, gender preferences, race, creed, religion, and color! Our goal is to remind each Burner who visits us that they are beautiful.

name: Contraptionists
description:
Come join us for
   Our Afternoon Fire and ice parties with FireFries & SnowCones & You,
 1-3 Monday - Friday. , as the ice and potatoes holds out.

Fix Your Broken Shit. Bring your broken stuff on by to get help making it right again. From welding to electrical to broken trinkets and everything in between. Fixers available from 1-3 or whenever we're home

 Evening Tea time,
   Bring your own cup and crumpets for a quiet evening with friends.
 Monday Wednesday Friday 6:00 till 7:00

Community shared discussion on Orgasm at 7 pm Thursday evening
We will provide a safe space for sharing and discussion on healthy benefits of Orgasm

Psychic and medium, Starfish, will do psychic readings daily. Check for schedule.

name: Sticky's Playground
description: Sticky's Playground is a place where people experience the incredible satisfaction of doing things they didn't know they could do.  A place where playfulness and free energy are king and queen and come together in a  magical oasis! Visit Sticky's Playground to to tap into your inner child in this world of mega-sized playground structures, games, and transport you back to your schoolyard days when it was easy to have fun simply running in circles.

name: Gallavant
description: Ahoy from the Pirates of the Playa (infamous creators of the oldest Mutant Vehicle USS Nevada)…look for us "Gallavanting" around the playa spreading fun and adventure and hop a ride with us! !   Our mighty USS Nevada will be doing 2+ tours around playa daily from our home port so come visit us, enjoy our signature grogs concocted with our homemade distilled rum in an awesome full-fledged pirate bar, The ArrghBar. pARTicipate in our 2+ daily theme parties 10am and 2pm, come get your drink on, play games, and then relax in our Pirates Den – an amazing chill space with couches. Visit our Wayward Wenches Bazaar, because we got what you forgot. Stop by the Pirate Refueling Station for a snack.  Come party with us....It's sure to be an adventure.

name: Club Bamboo
description: A relaxing place to come and chill, we offer shade, misting machines and a chance to connect with fellow human beings. Try to lift the heavy suspended rocks and guess their weight!

name: Lovin' Oven
description:
Hot fresh Bread Baked Daily; Tuesday thru Sunday
Served with music, mint tea and love in our shady Bedouin tent
Bread baking lessons
Burn Night Cookie Bakes!

name: The Royals
description: The Royals - only camp for the royals in Black Rock City.

name: Disco Ballz
description:
Crave Disco Music???  We have it for you.  Come check out our dancefloor with over 50 Disco Ballz!  The big party is on Thursday Night with giant video screen of all the original stars.  
We are also home of the Boogie Bug & Purple People Eater Mutant Vehicles, feel free to ask us to take you out on a ride.

name: YOUniversal
hometown: Primarily Los Angeles, CA (or Tehran-geles as we like to call it)
description:
YOUniversal Teahouse offers a Iranian / Persian Tea House, daily from 12pm to 8pm.

Come by for Iranian tea, exotic desert drinks / sherbets and yummy artisanal treats like sohan (saffron brittle) all served with a dose of Iranian / Persian Mysticism and loving hospitality that Iranian Sufi mystics like Rumi, Hafez and Ferdowsi would be proud of! :)

On Wednesday night we will host an open Iranian Dinner Party that should not be missed.  Authentic home-made Iranian food / stews / rice and tadeeg on the Playa!!

 Come on, what more could you ask for?

name: Coffee and Pasties
description: Coffee and Pasties - bringing organic coffee service with pasties to the Playa!

name: Flama Astral
description: Flama Astral, inspired in an ancient community where in order to live in harmony, people used to do certain tasks and receive from others. Participants are required to enroll in one of the areas, these areas can be: Food & Drinks, Music, Operations, Arts, Art car, Wellness and Interiorism.

name: Sunrise Tavern
description: Come for the bacon, stay for the sunrise. You gnome you'll like

name: The Sweet Spot
description:
The Sweet Spot is an enchanting, safe, and sacred space to explore our vulnerability and humanity through movement practices, spirituality, explorations of human relationships, and play.

We aim to nurture the body, mind, and spirit of all beings by offering spaces, events, and offerings to meet everybody exactly where they are.

Enjoy our Self-Care Tent, Come drink some herbal delights at our Elixir Bar, Melt into the Honey Pot Tea House, Play, Be Entertained, and Groove on Our Boogie Floor & Carefully Crafted Food Party Events, OH MY!

Oh and the fire pit, every night come by and warm your face and heart. 

See you here.

name: Battle Box
description: Come try your hand at radio controlled robot carnage!   We supply the table top sized battlebot cage, robots, controllers, building supplies, and a cheering section.  You bring your creativity and a friend (or enemy) to battle with. No friends? That's ok, we've got those too!

name: SpaceCatz
description: Come get cozy and channel your inner cosmic kitty with us! From Sound Healing and Earth Medicine, to cuddly creature comforts, SpaceCatz have the puurrfect vibrations for all of our feline friends. Too much catnip on the playa got you chasing your tail? Curl up and relax with our homegrown herbal teas while lounging in our human sized cuddle puddle cat box. A peaceful oasis for everyone to reset and recharge before their next astral adventure.

name: Camp Elektra
description: Come meet and hang out with our dragon Elektra.  She is ready to host you throughout the week at our animal themed costumed happy hour DJ parties as well as late nights out on the playa.  Come lounge with us while admiring the lights and fire effects of our magnificent dragon Elektra.

name: Tarwater
description: Come to Tarwater for Cut Throat Bowling, Lady S's Boutique, Rabbi Danny and Heathen Steven's Morning Meditation, Corn hole and Ladder Toss games, Quadruple Board Scrabble, a Science Fiction reading and book giveaway, Doctor Ira's Miracle Cures. Sit in the shade and join in on a conversation.

name: Chair Camp
description: The Dusty, cozy-as-can-be living room with room for all of our Chair people. Chair Camp is proud to be on playa for the second year, with 5 mutant vehicles and a 24/7 lounge-pad for when we're done stomping around deep playa + giving lifts to our burner neighbors and off adventuring. Cold beverages and warm, cozy hangs? Purrr.

name: Grateful Floyd
description: Grateful Floyd is a small theme camp dedicated to good music and frosty cold draft IPA. We'll be hosting a Medallion Making event on Wednesday at 11am. On Thursday at 8pm we host our signature event, Pink Floyd's Delicate Sound of Thunder concert on the big screen - a don't miss. And come back on Friday evening to our Cult Movie night at 8pm.

name: Temple Oasis
description: Please come join Temple Oasis and unwind from those stressful times out at the Temple or just share a story about your experiences.

name: Dye With Dignity
description: Come dye with us! Silk and instructions provided. Other days enjoy a snowcone in our shade!

name: Land of Monkey
description: At Land of Monkey, our ethos is that we are not yet fully human, and must evolve. We invite others to accompany us in this process of becoming, via a series of interactive experiences that empower us to become more human. Every day we serve the best artisanal iced lemonade and chai lattes in BRC - come for the ice drinks, and stay for the deep talks, good company, fun workshops, and yoga sessions. We are a multicultural, international, straight-friendly LGBTQ+ camp that welcomes all who join us in the dust. Swing by for a visit!

name: I'm OK, You're OK Corral
description: Well howdy ya dusty burners, the I'm OK, You're OK Corral is back on playa providing a rootin' tootin' boot scootin' good time. We invite you to mosey on over to our saloon where we'll be servin' up some ice-cold libations. It don't be matterin' if yer a sparkle pony, covered in playa, or the fast talkin' city folk kind, all are welcome!

name: Halloween Camp
description:
Halloween Camp brings out the inner child in all of us by taking us back to the vibes of that special day, where anybody can be anyone. 
We've got tricks, treats, workshops & beats. Come for self-care, a techno party scare, and sip on a frightfully spicy habanero mezcal cocktail. So come and yell BOOOO and enter the coven…if you dare!

name: Camp Gotalotgoinon
description: A collective of doers and artist that want to create a collaborative art space to share with others. Creating together and experiencing multi-sensory art that inspires connection and growth. Come play games, solve a puzzle, take a dance or flow class, just get your dance on, add to the collaborative drawing or string art or come relax and take it all in at the Fog tub. Whoever and whatever you create is art and we look forward to sharing ours with you and experiencing yours.

name: Muffin Bottoms
description: We are a group of artists, musicians, and all-around goofballs who love bringing silly, whimsical energy to the playa. Come by to enjoy cocktails, our immersive Clerb Crawl across our own miniature clubs, our live music & games, or find us in deep playa with giant 15-foot puppets.

name: Bag o' Dicks
description: Free spirited camp with good beats, booze, and the friendliest bag o' dicks around! Look for the big LED dicks in the sky and come say hi. A bag o' dicks isn't always a bad thing, come check out our dicks and judge for yourself.

name: La Ville Bohème
description: La Ville Bohème is a haven for the artistically inclined, seeker of depth, eccentric soul. Calling all musicians and lovers of music to come play, dance, and bask in the medicine of sound.

name: Camp Wineaux
description: Come join Camp Wineaux for intimate and fun wine tasting experiences.  We will rock your palates with wines from all over the world and challenge you during our popular blinded wine tasting event.  Don't miss our nighttime tasting extravaganza on Thursday night.

name: Mule Town
description: MuleTown: the home of three hugely inventive, yet modestly sized mutant vehicles. MuleTown welcomes you to stop by anytime for engaging MV dialog and the occasional MV or Skoolie seminar.

name: Ludus Symposium
description: Ludus (playful love) Symposium (Meeting for music, drinking and intellectual discussion) is a place to hang out on our friendly deck/bar above the playa and watch cheezy cult movies.

name: VooDoo Soup
description: hot soup live music

name: Pussy Avalanche
description: Nerdy?  Introverted?  Love cats?  Oh - do we have camp for you.  Pussy Avalanche is an oasis in the desert for people who don't match the Instagram Burner ideal.  We think you are perfect just the way you are.  We are low key, low stress, and run events that won't take you out of your comfort zone.

name: Down Low Club
description: Host of annual LGBTQ+ Meet & Greet on Monday night, Little Black Dress Party on Tuesday night and an au-courant TV-show themed Party (2022's was Moira Rose/Schitt's Creek) on Thursday night. Also, since 2009, hosting the 24 hour interactivity in our Down Low Club tent, providing a discreet, enclosed and air-conditioned space for erotic play between consenting 18+ adult male-identified individuals.

name: Capricious Cat Herding
description:
Capricious Cat Herders may be fickle but like all felines we can be won over by good snacks and scratches. Come for comfort, catamount connections, and leonine learning.

What are you waiting for? Come join right meow!

name: Chico Urban Area
description: Come dance with us on a ride to the next galaxy on the Intergalactic Transporter!

name: Saint Molly's Academy
description: Saint Molly Academy is the center for BRC citizens to bring out their inner child. We offer wholesome fun with an adult twist. Stop by and visit our famous day beds, stay for sunset and be a part of communion and confessional, and attend our Friday prom and graduation party.

name: 3rd Alternative: Jail of Hedone
description: Come be theatrically judged by the Court of Hedone and escape the heat and dust by being sentenced to the Jail of Hedone, and relax under cooling area misters, with cool drinks, cold beer, snacks, the occasional foot wash and other hedonistic pleasures. Even Absinthe. M-F noon to 5pm.

name: Reno CORE Staff and Art Camp
description: Reno Core Staff and Art Camp

name: HexMix
description: Come relax at Camp HexMix and enjoy spa services as well as guided meditations based on traditional Indian art forms.

name: Alternative Energy Zone
description: A village dedicated to using Solar & Wind, not only for Burning Man, but all year long. We don't allow generators, so our village is fairly quiet. Anyone is welcome to sign up to camp with us. We DON'T have "DUES".

name: Camp Desert of Eden
description: Escape the elements and indulge in our garden of earthly delights, inspired by the fiery fate of humanity consumed by passion and pleasure. We will be providing food and nourishment daily at our "Giving Kitchen"  including vegan and GF options. For the weary and tired of heart, we invite you to relax in our giant shaded cuddle puddle but don't forget to take in the view atop our 20 ft. tall LED tree house and howl at the vast landscape that surrounds you. For those who are just passing by, stop at our "24 Hour Electrolyte Vanity Bar" where you can refuel your water bottle and freshen up your face.

name: Black Rock Disc Golf Club
hometown: Founded in Santa Cruz, Stored in Richmond, Members everywhere
description:
Black Rock Disc Golf Club has a mushroom-themed disc golf course which embraces fun, games, friendly competition, collaboration, and creativity. We provide a place where folks can join together and throw one of the custom stamped discs loaned out at the camp. You can win one at one of our tournaments or events! The course is accessible 24/7, and discs glow in the dark so don't hesitate to swing by late night/early morning for a round. 

We also have some mushroom hazards on the course! We have tall ones, small ones, ones that glow, and ones that show you what disc golf is all about. It's definitely a psychedelic experience to walk through, even if you aren't in the mood to play a round. Just make sure to listen for the call of, "FORE!"

name: Camp Peace of Ass
description: If riding your bike is a "Pain in the Patootie", come see us at Camp Peace of Ass where we will address your irritation by covering your bike seat in a cushy, colorful, fleecy, bike seat cover.  It is Guaranteed to bring Peace to you Ass, or your money back. Enjoy our mirror array, and "pop-up" activities while you wait.

name: Sprackcity!
description: SprackCity! Aims to create a spirit of creativity and interactivity by offering three experiences that we believe embody the 10 core principles and are essential to a successful burn. Play games at our casino, rest in our swamp cooled dome, dance in the dome at night.

name: Neon Turtle Barcade
description: Neon Turtle Barcade is a retro gaming bar at Burning Man featuring nightly tournaments, specialty cocktails and prizes. Kid and parent friendly.

name: Sunset Lounge
description:
Sunset Lounge, you know us and you love us. 
Up to our usual shenanigans .. Come find us!

name: The Leftovers
description: The Leftovers is a group of veteran burners who feed and quench the thirst of residents of Black Rock City.  What do we offer?  Hot Dogs!  Adult Beverages!  Great conversation, dance, music and a place to relax!

name: Kelly's
description: Kelly's is a close-knit, gay-friendly diverse camp with a history at burning man that goes back to 1993, Come chill out in our Art Light Chill Space or learn something new about: Coffee Appreciation, Playa Cooking, and Lana Del Rey.  Come with an open attitude and be prepared to make new friends.

name: Camp Pendant
description: Welcome one and all! Come by and pick up one of this year's pendants or a "BURNER" bike license plate. Rest your weary feet, and tell us about your year while crafting a headphone keeper. Be sure to check out the day's swag on our gifting tree. Whether you take a little something or leave a little something, it's here to make everyone's day a little brighter. Nights too frenetic? Sit and watch our relaxing fractal display.

name: Cameltopia
description: You Look Thirsty! Welcome to Cameltopia, your desert oasis and refuge from the sun's heat. You are welcome to pet the camels but please do not feed the animals. Recharge your soul and fill your vessel with premium unleaded H20 at our post-apocalyptic "Route 66" gas station. Our attendants will refuel your canteen while you browse our Inconvenience Store. Saturday-Friday 10AM-4PM Playa Standard Time. Wednesday afternoon is our annual "Hump Day" party with an eclectic mix of tail-shaking beats!

name: Flower Tower
description: Feel the POWER of the FLOWER TOWER as you climb our 3-story tower with observation deck for a prime view over BRC.  Dangle from the tower's swings, hammocks, and lyra.  Enjoy music from the house band late afternoon/evenings.  Join us in band "jam-a-longs", sports tourneys, or other activities listed daily at the tower.

name: PolyParadise
description:
The Village of PolyParadise has been influencing the Hearts & Minds and Washing the Bodies of Playa Citizens from '2:00 - 10:00' since 1999 celebrating 25 years in BRC in 2023.

Polyamory involves openness to multiple loving relationships, with honesty among all partners. We welcome ALL Poly & Poly Friendly folks to camp within our borders.

The Village of PolyParadise 2023 welcomes the addition of two Theme Camps within its borders | Twisted Swan | Temple of Bacchus.

PolyParadise is NOT a Swinger Camp. Being Poly or Practicing Poly is NOT a requirement for camping with us, but being OPEN MINDED about other people's lifestyle choices IS!!

name: WayLate
description: The ultimate Sahara lounge, open 24/7 to all;  iced coffee in the morning, great people and music all day long.

name: Poetry in Motion
description:
Find yourself at Home
Stop and write a Little Poem
C'mon in Day or Night

name: HEX Collective
description:
Join us for a Feast of the Senses: a host of interactive activities designed to tantalize your 5 senses and leave you with a sixth, HEXsense! Including:

HEXperience from 9pm to 11pm [every 30 mins]
DJs and Bar from 3pm to 6pm
Daily workshops from 11am to 3pm
Morning coffee/tea from 8am to 10am

All events are scheduled Monday through Friday. Hope to see you!

name: Playa Jazz Cafe
description: Live Jazz Jam Sessions every night from 10pm - 2am. Great Drinks served at the bar.  Jazz History, Theory, and instrument specific Workshops in the afternoons.

name: Unicorn Space Launch
description: Unicorn Space Launch is a collective of incredible baby blue and baby pink unicorns that love to make the world a better place. Come visit us for some intellectually stimulating conversation paired with an aperol spritz or freshly blended margarita.

name: Santo Cabron
description:
El santo cabron is based on an old nursery rhyme by acclaimed poet and god among humans, killer of love and lover of white mountain tops, Diomedez Dias.
.
As the legend goes, the creature is so benevolent that it was able to forgive his girlfriend for betraying him and sparing her live.

name: Street Cats
description: Art support camp that is down to chill if we are around

name: Camp Scone Fucker
description: Come enjoy some iced tea as cold and your ex's heart and scones and dry as the playa, music by our resident DJs ChrisTOOLpher and Wejo, games, workshops and so much more

name: Dust Circus
description: We are a multicultural and multinational group of people with various backgrounds and lifestyles who decided to create a special space on the Playa. Come to us to have fun and participate in all our activities - Acroyoga, Shibari, New Year celebration, Creation of Garden of Wishes.    And do not hesitate to hop on our beautiful Mutant Vehicle, the Shroom when you see it gliding on the Playa, let"s  experience the beauty of the Playa altogether.

name: Camp Fire Dance
description: Camp Fire Dance is a Persian inspired camp where we warmly invite you to sit and enjoy the warm Persian hospitality along with live music and dancing every evening. Persian, tea, coffee and dates served every morning. Shamanic lead fire ceremony invites you to share your story and re write it under the stars and within our sacred space.

name: Got Your Back
description:
Got Your Back!
We have a specialized team ready to treat your ailing body from all the Burningman you've been doing. Drop by for a 15-to-30-minute body massage or adjustment.

name: Electron-Help
description: Camp Eleto-Help is here to assist you with any electronic / mechanical help you may find your self in need of during your stay at Burning man. Staffed by hands-on engineers, we can help you with most break downs of LED-strips electrical problems you might have with your mutant vehicle, Generator,  or any other electronic / mechanical issue.

name: House Of Skin
description: Don't act like bacon on the Playa. Stop by House of Skin for your daily rub down of sunscreen and a drink or grab a bottle and some chap stick to go.

name: KaraCowklette
description:
Do you wanna feel like a Star?
Shine with us on our Karaoke!
Taste our Burning Raclette that give you sparkles on your mouth!
Try a pétanque game with our gleam balls!
Follow the 13 stars flag and come to us!

name: ElectriCity
description: ElectriCity will help your electrons flow, accumulate, or disperse on playa, through electronics and bike repair support, LED and device solar charging, and providing an electrically balanced rest stop in the dust, complete with electrolytes to positively recharge your body and mind.

name: Diddly Squat Café
description: Small café serving limited number of cups of coffee most mornings.  Bring your own cup.

name: Leopard Martini Lounge
description: The LEOPARD MARTINI LOUNGE has been returning since 1998 serving top shelf cocktails in a chill area with wonderful people.  The LML BIKE REPAIR SHOP will return this year to support our community.  BETTY'S PIE SHOP will continue to serve fresh pie daily in a no rush atmosphere.  PARADISE FOUND will return to provide a chill out area with misters.  CLEO the mutant vehicle with continue to roam the playa.

name: Camp Shameless
description: Shameless is a LBGTQWERTY+ friendly camp and we are truly without shame.  There isn't much that someone from our camp will not do for your entertainment! Shameless is a BDSM-friendly, Sex-Positive, love-filled theme camp...plus we drink a lot!

name: Camp Frame Works
description: Camp Frame Works will have warm broth (vegan options as well) to get you nice and warm on those cold nights in the dust.

name: MeatisGross
description: MeatisGross saving the world by not eating meat, plus it is gross.

name: Camp Sweaty Betty
description:
Friendly neighborhood misting Parlor, Hair Salon and Bike Repair. Stop in and experience an overall cooling sensation from head to foot as you stroll through the mist. Got crunchy hair, feeling a bit beat... Get in early for a partner provided hair wash.  Got a flat, derailleur doesn't work, chain broke, we can fix that also. 
Misting & Bike Repair = Open 11:00 to 4:00.
Bike Repair = DIY Service 10:00 am – 7:00 pm. 
Hair Salon = Open Monday – Thursday 9:00 am – 1:00 pm, Friday 9:00 am – 11:00 am.

name: DeMentha
description: Mojitos, mist & dancing served up with a warm welcome.

name: GalixAxia
description: A Dive Camp of Synthwave, Retro-Future Wave, CyberPunk Wave, Interstellar and Space Travel. Synthwave Music, Neon Colors Lights and Lasers. Apocalyptic Retro Future, Neo-Noir Atmosphere.

name: Equal and Opposite Camp
description: Life involves changes, and we are honored to help Burner's navigate the powerful playa energy by teaching them to consult the I-CHING. We offer a simple and practical take on Lao Tsu's teachings. We also practice Tai Chi at sunrise and sunset when possible, come join us!

name: Space Potatoes
description: We are the Space Potatoes and we come in peace! We are primarily the art support camp for our deep-playa art: Color Dance! Feel free to stop by to chat and check out our ergableds.

name: La Felicità
description:
Life is an ever-flowing spectrum, and we've all learned that to delight in Happiness is a choice. A feeling we choose to seek out and vibrate everyday, no matter what the circumstances. 

So for those seeking a pause from the discord and a space to return to our most pure and highest state, we share with you the opportunity to join us in a special camp dedicated to the Spirit of Joy and Adventure.

name: Snack Shack
description: Flogs and dogs.

name: Rat Trap
description: We are your dirty bar that never closes. Come on by day or night. Drink our booze, ride our horse and join us in radical self stupidity.

name: Regis
description: Our team is always ready to be a "phone a friend" and lend a hand to fellow Burners with their installations. We know that when it comes to creating amazing art, you have to "ask the audience" and collaborate with others to bring your vision to life. And of course, we believe that when it comes to Burning Man, the answer is always to "use a lifeline" and rely on your community for support.

name: Camp Conechella
description: Are you a cone-noisseur of bad puns? Join our pun cone-test! Come play with our two ☀️ solar grills which occisionally turn pure sunlight into 🍪 cookies.

name: Barbie Swim Up Bar
description:
Relax into the resort lifestyle at Black Rock City's only  SWIM UP BAR!

Bathing suits optional.

name: Glitter and Rust
description: Folks Enjoying Burning Man without generators.

name: The Assless Chapel
description: The Assless Chapel is here to marry you!  Whether you want a serious ceremony or just some quick nuptials; a temporary marriage or a bond for life; we want you to get married here!  Have the wedding you want, not the one the default world demands.  All people welcome, all ceremonies conducted, all marriage arrangements respected.

name: Rascaltown
description: A friendly place to hang out inside of Hushville, where all the coolest rascals live.

name: Dear Mom
description:
Dear Mom is a camp centered on celebrating the women & role models in your life. We provide a relaxing and inclusive space on playa to have a cup of tea, reflect on those who helped make you who you are, and write a letter on custom Goddess stationary to the important figures in your life.

M-F 10am-12 & 8-10pm

name: P³ Oasis
description:
We take the term "oasis" seriously.
We're a place to get out of the sun, get a good drink,
get away from the electronic music, and get a great view!

name: Electric Cheese Land
description: Electric Cheeseland brings the fun of the Apres-Ski culture to the desert. Yodel songs, cheesy evenings to taste delicious food from the Alps, play interactive games and cheer with a shot of vodka. The "Naked Cheese nights" will feed the crowd with melted cheese, the "Cheese-n-Chill tent" will provide shelter and entertainment and the Polish Vodka Bar will challenge anyone's knowledge about flavors and mixology.

name: Second Wind Pirate Cafe
description:
Second Wind Pirate Cafe is a unique coffee shop that caters to coffee lovers who appreciate the pure taste of black coffee. The shop is decorated with pirate-themed decor, making it a fun and quirky spot to grab a cup of coffee. The shop's name "Second Wind" refers to the idea that a strong cup of black coffee can give you that extra boost of energy you need to tackle your day.
We offer games including the world-famous Jam or Lube? and Guess That Sea Shanty! as well as immersive theater experiences such as Megaphone 5 Minute Battle, Sex With Ghosts, and "Don't Slip" Interactive Art played. 
Find the warm, inviting glow of a pirate-themed hexagonal-shaped coffee bar with the Jolly Roger flying high above it. Follow the smell of freshly brewed coffee and the sound of distant sea shanties!

name: Pussy Day Spa
description:
If there is one "must do" at Burning Man, it's a visit to the Pussy Day Spa.   We offer a choice of refreshing body wash, pubic hair trim, and pussy massage including happy ending. What's not to like?

Pleasure and bliss awaits as we pamper and delight you. Your boundaries will be respected, your feedback / adjustments encouraged, and your wishes fulfilled.

We guarantee it will be the best experience you will ever have at Burning Man, or anywhere else. Open daily from 1 to 5 pm, we take reservations (recommended) as well as walk-ins.

name: Goa People
description: We are bringing Russian Winter to Playa! Join us in our ice-bar and cool down at -20C. We will offer fur coats and warm hats at the entrance, then we will serve you hard liquor and mulled wine, and afterwards, we will warm you up next to the fireplace, where you can dance with us.

name: Decadent Oasis
description: A windswept grove of white palm trees by day, with fun activities abound; an iridescent oasis in the dark of night. Welcome to the magical playground of Decadent Oasis, where we invite you to dance, play, perform, and chill. Fun experiences and games, performance stage, dance parties, and friendly folks imbue within an eco-conscious camp made from mostly reclaimed/reused materials. Stop by for a warm welcome and find shelter from the storm.

name: Peace and Love 2023
description: We invite you to be part of the peace and love spirit. Come and make your own peace sign necklace in our workshop

name: Irrelephant Bird Camp
description: Colorful eyebrows? CHECK! Dunking Contest? CHECK! Bad Movies? CHECK! Yacht rock? Jock rock? Not rock? Check, check, and check! Trying to get a handle on what we do here at Irrelephant Bird Camp? Don't even try it. Just come by and get a little silly with us, touch base with reality, or take a nap overseas.

name: Nothing Butt Art
description:
We supply the canvas and paint, you supply the cheeks or any other body part, together, we will create nothing butt art! Complimentary T-shirts provided to participants. No Body Shaming here; Bring what you got it and we'll turn it into Art! Woohoo! We also feature body stamp temporary tattoos . Stop by, make some art and get a tramp stamp.

Sunset Journey Home Table. Share your journey "Home" while enjoying an ice cold IPA. Our bar table has become a focal point for all to express themselves with marking pens, paint, pictures for gifting their stories for all who visit the camp.

name: Camp Starstruck
description:
Camp Starstruck runs the KAEZ radio station. 
Tune in on 96.3FM  10am-8pm Sunday to Saturday for eclectic and entertaining programing, or come and visit us at the AEZ tower, in the AEZ village.
We are a 100% solar powered camp and radio station.

name: HamLit
description: Support camp and home base for HamLit

name: FAFA Camp
description: Stop by FAFA Camp, and you may very well meet a new friend who will offer you a cozy refuge, some libations, and a warm welcome. Our Campers come from all over the world and U.S., and this international and national diversity drives the ambience of our camp and our interactivities. We sing; we dance; we offer interesting interactivities that often change from year to year; we participate in our neighborhood. We look forward to meeting you all!

name: In Queso Emergency
description: Welcome back to In Queso Emergency! We love adventuring, cuddling, and dancing, and also we like eating tacos. So, come join us for a breakfast taco and cold brew coffee from 2-4pm Monday-Wednesday, and don't miss our Brisket party from 4-8pm on Thursday. Hang out in our cafe area 24-7 and enjoy our custom LED light display from our cuddle puddle.

name: Shipwreck Tiki Lounge
description: Old school tiki and pirate lounge.  Deadly elixers served since 2007.  Hands off the mermaids!

name: Bestiality Fantasy Camp
description:
We're a space for people to explore their bestiality fantasy in a consensual and LEGAL way. Toys, condoms, and lube will be provided. 21+, IDs will be checked. No single men. Look for the BFC sign.

Anyone who attempts to use the space to plan illegal activities will be immediately and permanently expelled.

name: Future Turtles
description:
The Future Turtles is your friendly gay-next-door camp. Join us for our sunset parties and hit on our adorkable bartenders. Our comfortable lounge is open and welcoming 24/7.  

If you're a little braver, we offer Desert HIIT every morning: a real HIIT workout that is accessible to people of all fitness levels and abilities, but also actually a good workout too. 

Then come to the pillow fort at night, for socially sexual activities in a male, fully consent-based environment. 

Either way we promise you'll meet the nicest people and make lifelong friends!

name: Polyhedra
description: Polyhedra's polyglamorous queer tranarchists say "is that a triangle or are you square to see me?". Come chill in our Queeramid, circle up at Extemporaneous Gay-bate and get in shape on our monkey bars. Embrace your angles at Trash Trans Tuesday and party with us on Friday!

name: Camp BUI
description: Burners Under the Influence – one of the friendliest camps on the playa. Camp BUI was started in 2006 and over the years have added friends as well as numerous Burners who happened to camp near us and asked to join. We are known for our excellent cuisine, our Shot of the Day, and our Pineapple Upside Down Cake Thursday event, and our spacious common area where visitors can enjoy a sit in the shade and a cold drink of water. Camp BUI takes citizenship of Black Rock City seriously and we heartily embrace the 10 Principles. Visit us at campbui.org.

name: A-playa-mask
description: Breathe easy with the Maskman's quality N-95 dusk masks with their non toxic psychedelic Burning Man logo. And don't forget our our Breathe Easy nose plugs, BM stickers, pins and BM stencils.

name: Latica
description: We are a very diverse camp that will exemplify radical inclusion. This camp will be 100% populated by latinX individuals from Venezuela, Mexico and various hispanic upbringings.

name: Camp Not For Prophets
description: Hottest holes on the playa.  Start your morning with a hot hole.  Monday thru Thursday 8:30- 10:30 AM.  Come enjoy freshly fried donut holes at Camp Not for Prophets.

name: Highku
description: Highku is a beautiful and interactive place to play, pause and recover. The different spaces of our little oasis provide a spectrum of opportunities to move and explore, pause and escape, and recover from the night before with remedies and care from around the world.  Learn how to manage your well-being and neurotransmitters in our "Zen and the Art of Seratonin" workshops.

name: Awkward & Tawdry Lounge
description: Part bar. Part lounge. Part theater. Part chill. Part Shoot Your Balls Off. Park Karaoke. Part Playa Tatoos. 100% Awkward & Tawdry.

name: Disco Roboto
description: Gratitude Love and Fun. We are a group of healers, dancers, friends, artists, creatives and foodies.  Deep playa and camp dancing on Iron Giants disco floor.  Morning Healing circles, yoga and meaningful workshops.  Sunset trips to deep playa and a Friday Gratitude Shabbat circle.

name: PhoCureBurn
description:
It all began in 2019 when three of the founders, Michelin, Cheeky, and OMG, hosted a Pho pop-up in deep playa. The experience was so delicious and meaningful, it inspired them to create PhoCureBurn, a Vietnamese-inspired cafe serving comfort food to the citizens of Black Rock City.

PhoCureBurn believes that food has the power to bring people together and create a sense of community. We aim to create a space where people can come together, share stories over an iced(!!!) coffee or a bowl of pho, and form lasting memories.

name: Cosmic Curanderos Cafe
description: will include a 24/7 coffee and tea bar that will also provide vitamins and plant medicine to refresh your body, mind and soul- tucked inside a shaded rainforest with entrance to our indigenous smoke lodge where we will provide massages and stick readings, sound baths and ample space to rest and restore. Our unique blends of tinctures will be provided for all weary souls. Smudge away negativity release the things that no longer serve you. Connect with mother nature and your higher self. Take a nap in the rainforest, cool off under the misters

name: Antea fun
description: We are a bunch of artists who are Antea Fun. We like to host tea parties and build dinosaurs with doll heads attached to them. Come join us for a sculpture making work shop, a cup of tea, or play on our playground located at the front of our camp.

name: Soulshakers
hometown: Queenstown, Koh Phangan, Vancouver, NYC, Lagos
description: Soulshakers is working together to support and nourish one another is at the heart of who we are as a community. Whether we are living together in Thailand attending regional burners, we are dedicated to support each other remotely as we enhance our Nomadic lives, we are solid as a community and feel that the space we hold between us can inspire other Burners to live courageously and less conventionally, as we all aim to do as a community together

name: Butt Putt
description: Paramotors and Putt Putt! Butt Putt offers 24 hour mini golf Monday-Saturday and Paramotor Flights over the Playa Monday - Friday. Flights are first come first served from 6am-9am weather dependent. Come play Butt Putt with our family friendly (tasteful) jungle animal butt holes and immerse yourself in our funky jungle beats. Our holes are playa posh and ready to be filled!

name: Pandora's Lounge & Fix-it Shoppe
description: Our camp keeps our fellow Burners biking: our repair shop offers education, tools and parts, for bike repair. Actually we'll help you repair just about anything, but bikes are our specialty. We also love to mix drinks and host visitors in our adjacent lounge.

name: Wrongtown
description:
Wrongtown is an international family reunion gathering year round at events around the globe including Burning Man which is the main event! We have members on almost every Continent and from all walks of life.

Our goal is to create a space for our friends and family to experience the playa to its fullest. Providing everything needed to survive on the playa including an amazing chill space, fully equipped kitchen, vast covered tent city and camp showers. While we provide everything, we do expect and count on our members to pitch in to build, strike and keep things running during the event.

Providing everything to survive allows our campmates to focus on amazing projects and epic performances.

name: noMADart
description: NoMad Art is a family friendly camp that is offering fun creative Art activities using recycled and reusable materials. Being creative is one of the best ways to open the mind and the spirit to see the beauty in things that may not be noticed otherwise.

name: Half Baked
description: Come make Shrink Art Jewelry (necklaces, earrings, keychains, bike tags, etc.) using our solar ovens.  Tuesday thru Saturday, noon - 2pm.  All art supplies and solar ovens will be provided.  Walk away with cool, self-made swag, along with a greater understanding of the wonderful world of solar cooking.

name: Dusty Muppets
description: The Dusty Muppets tend to the Rhythm Jism Art Project that is found out on the open playa at a location TBD and host open mic jam sessions in our time off.

name: Black Rock Center for Unlearning
description: The only true 24/7 bar on playa. Whether you drink or not, come on by. We're always here for you.

name: Aurora
description: There's a magic to the dawn, and we're always grateful to receive it. Whether it's the end of a long night or the start of a beautiful new day, we love sharing that early-morning serenity with friends both old and new. Our international crew speaks the common tongue of hospitality, and it's our true joy to extend the sun's warmth through good food, good music, and good conversation.

name: Bob's Bar
description: Bob's Bar is a bar that isn't just a bar. Within this simple playa hardy shelter tales of fiery art are shared and musings of infernal creations yet to be born are excitedly exchanged. It's a place to cool off in the shade with a cold beer, a gathering post for friends of Bonefire Bob and a community center for Illumination Village. There will be storytelling, dusty hugs and endless smiles. We will be having an ongoing memorial for Bob throughout the week. He was the heart of our village and to many the heart of BRC. Come celebrate his Life with us.

name: Sally The Soul Suckers
description: The place to go if you want your past, present, or future told. Spin the wheel of omens and discover what kind of surprises you have in store!

name: Fire Conclave Convergence
description: All members of accepted fire groups for the Great Circle must check in at Fire Conclave Convergence

name: Creation Nation BRC!
description: Our camp at Black Rock City provides a shaded inclusive place for people to Learn and Do! We offer unique Making Workshops (that provides supplies to create fun items to take "home" with you. Skill Share (Learn and Do).  Mon-Fri 10am till 2pm. Come by and make fun stuff/learn fun stuff in the shade!

name: Desert RATS
description: Alternative Energy Zone a Burning Man camp that runs on Solar generated energy. Fossil fueled generators are not allowed.

name: MOOP Museum
description: Did you stumble across something on the playa that someone can reuse, like a functioning bike light, or a super-rad dinosaur figurine in the dust? Bring it to the MOOP Museum and have our curators evaluate it for acceptance into our exhibit. All are welcome to peruse the exhibit and will maybe even find something they want to take with them on permanent loan.

name: IPOW-Indigenous People of World
hometown: Traditional land of the Dakota People
description: IPOW-Indigenous People of World brings Indigenous people and allies from around the world together to share their stories and life experiences. This camp creates a place to share Indigenous culture and educate all who want to join our camp or our events to learn. IPOW is a place to spread Indigenous culture, teachings, and help all who want to learn about who Indigenous people are and were. We would be honored if our Two Spirit community would be an integral part of our camp. The camp is safe space for all Indigenous people and allies. It is a place people can learn and share traditions, foods before and after colonization, games, storytelling, languages, and music. In 2023 the camp will continue the buffalo theme as "Buffalo Rising."

name: Swag of Burning Man
description:
Visit the "Swag of Burning Man" camp at Black Rock City. See thousands of pieces of swag collected, gifted, and preserved by burners year to year since 2008.

Day or night, make a commemorative necklace with us for yourself or someone else. Visit us in the evening for our Branding station, sealing your memory of Black Rock City 2023. 

Swag can be preserved and documented by donating at the "Swag of Burning Man" camp and you can also donate to our interactive shadow boxes on the wall in Center Camp or by visiting our website.

name: Kerosene
description:
Camp Kerosene is back baby! 
Come and enjoy our shaded lounge while working on your broken bicycle!
New this year is laser engraving, so come bring your trinkets to be customized.

name: Pig Nest
description:
We like to pig out and chill hard. 
And maybe get a little rowdy... mostly get rowdy.

name: Primal Oasis
description: Step off playa into a lushly appointed bar for refreshments, ferocious games, and delightfully strange conversations. Fruity water by day, juicy cocktails at night.

name: Disco Bunny
description: A little disco bunny support camp for the art car Gladys Bright, a large geometric disco loving bunny rabbit that poops tiny butterfinger ice cream cones and gives rides to weary burners who might need a little pick me up or have lost their way.

name: Sleepless
description:
If you ever wonder how all these glass beads are created stop by in Adopt A Bead camp! See the magic, adopt one for yourself so it will remind you about this time on Playa.
You also might want to check our exclusive collection of scarves!

name: 3SP (Third Space Place)
description: 3SP (Third Space Place) is your dusty, comfy front porch/living room combo serving as a Black Rock City "third space" — a relaxing, community spot offering a real sense of welcome and belonging beyond one's dwelling ("first space") and one's workplace ("second space"). As with any true third space, guests can stop by, relax, ask for directions, chat, or PARTICIPATE in one of 3SP's events focusing on all kinds of issues: being introverted on Playa; navigating the world as a stutterer/stammerer; identifying unconscious biases; Native-American appreciation versus appropriation; identifying your Archetype; and more. We've been around since 2015 and we've got campers from DC, NYC, Minneapolis, Portland, LA, and beyond. Come on by!

name: Costco Soulmate Trading Outlet
description: The playa's original and longest-running soulmate trading outpost. Come and experience our unparalleled matching system, honed over 26 years of no-frills soulmate trading and find your new best friend.

name: Black Rock City Tea Company
description: Enjoy a hot or cold cup of fine tea and engaging conversation in our calming Tea Salon, and participate in a Tea Ceremony led by our enlightened Tea Masters. In the afternoons sing along with our famous songstress and her 300 tune songbook. Our tea bartenders are pleased to add libations to tea for guests of legal drinking age.

name: Camp Bird of Paradise
description:
Camp Bird of Paradise is the support camp for the mutant vehicle   Bird of Paradise

Our artistic theme is a cross between the Bird of Paradise Flower and a Mardi Gras parade float.

The Bird of Paradise  provides access out to the playa art installations    We share or transportation with any and all denizens of Black Rock City ... Day and Night.  The BOP has bicycle racks and shade.

We are especially cognizant of  those with limited mobility or limited bicycle skills.  

The Bird of Paradise will be even more artistically appealing this time out with added wow factor while engaging the 2023 theme of Animalia. 

Our home camp is a shady place to lounge and interact with our eclectic crew of philosophers and physicians out of Mammoth Lakes California.

name: TOC Does Le Chalet
description: TOC Does Le Chalet - Swiss Ski Lodge serving cocktails and dusty Après Ski fun

name: Playa Beignet Love Project
description: GET YOUR MORNING DOSE OF BEIGNETS (Starting Wednesday of Build Week) every morning at Playa Beignet Love Project -- Fresh, Delicious & HOT. Bring your own coffee or Jobi Coffee is in our HUB. Our campers will be delighted to serve you.

name: Home Sweet Dome
description: At the heart of Hushville, Home Sweet Dome offers shade in the daytime, a lighted area at night, for social interaction and chill. No music, this is Hushville, unless it's home made hand made with acoustic instruments. We host events in the Hushville Events Calendar with our space, and offer battery charging for your phones, cameras, computers, etc. We also can provide light bike repair, and have some supplies to get your bike back up and running.

name: Wonky Colours
description: Welcome to Wonky Love Colours, the camp where we believe life is too short to colour inside the lines! Come join us for a wild ride of collaborative art-making as we paint on the playa with love, laughter, and a whole lot of wonky colours. Whether you're a seasoned artist or someone who just wants to get their hands dirty, we invite you to unleash your inner child and let your creativity run free. Who knows, you might even contribute to the ultimate masterpiece that will leave Burners speechless! So put on your brightest colours, and let's make some beautiful magic together!

name: Namaste & Chill
description: A compassionate community of dreamer-doers specializing in sacred spaces and heart-centered events. Join us for daily meditations, workshops, and tea/elixir service! Our meditation lounge is open 24 hours a day for sacred rest and connection.

name: Insomnophilia
description: It is time to rev your brain engine and get ready for a looooong night (and/or day)!! Whatever your state, our caffeinated beverages and participatory revelry will stimulate you. Join us at Insomnophilia for coffee-based beverages made from our home-roasted beans (brought to you from Seattle!), dance to inspiring beats from our resident DJs, and engage in playful collaborative creativity with us. All are invited and encouraged to be nocturnal creatures with us!

name: Scorpion's Lair
description: big (2-3 feet) metal scorpions and insects

name: Heart of Now
description: Come into the moment to explore yourself with presence & emotional intimacy. Eye gazing & space to share in a luscious experience of deep connection.

name: Hydrology N Civic Responsibility
description: Visit us and learn about Hydrology and how it can relate to Civic Responsibility.

name: Just Roll With It
description: Do you love board games? Do you love sand, winning prizes, and being a live pawn within a game? If so, join us for a human sized board game called SandyLand. Our camp welcomes all ages! Join us for games, drinks, music, and prizes!

name: BRC Tour of Home
description: We are the "Principle" Real Estate Brokers of Black Rock City - featuring our Teeny Tiny Village of Homes, Scavenger Hunt with Prizes, Glow in the Dark Bocce Ball and Real Estate Listings that will knock your sandals off! We will have an activity board with the full schedule in our display. Stop by for some lemonade. You can become a Principle Broker too!

name: Avocado "Toast"
description: Come enjoy a nice breakfast of avocado toast and mimosas! Try out our champagne bubble blaster, have some breakfast, and meet new friends before heading out on the playa!

name: Compass of the Four Winds Camp
description: Four Winds Camp is an art camp. This camp is focused on building and maintaining the installation Compass of the Four Winds. Y'all drop by if you're lost and needing direction in your life.

name: Black Rock PyleOn
description: PyleON the Pylons! We are a bi-coastal group of autocross enthusiasts, who also appreciate beer, shiny lights, bacon, designing courses, racing cars, and talking about racing cars. We especially love vintage muscle cars, video game cars, and tiny toy cars. Oh and driving real, real fast (unprofessional drivers on closed courses only).

name: CatLand
description: Bring all of your 9 lives to CatLand, where we are serving up drinks, food, and plenty of playful pussys! CatLand features the Chaise lounge where you can sip some milk and lick your wounds after a long day on the playa. We look forward to welcoming all you feral felines for Tacos and crafts or carnival games (Monday/Wednesday noon to two). Come cool down your furry self with some ice cold snow cones on Thursday afternoon half passed three to five. Whether you are in need of a cat nap, a cold drink, or some shade from the sun, we have what you need to feel purrdy. We are inclusive to dogs, but they must be leashed at all times.

name: Camp PlayApology
description: Black Rock City's first "Custom Apology Delivery Service" offers Playa-friendly flowers, Burner-centric cards, and singing "SorryGrams" for BRC residents looking to make playAmends. We also have cards for other occasions. Send out a card, relax in our breezy shade structure, or have a shot of artisanal, home-infused vodka at our Well Of Regret. Check Playa Events for info on our Sorry Soiree, Pickle-tini Party, Hail Bloody Mary Party, Playa-Fit and assorted daytime workshops and activities. Want to beta-test your amazing theme camp idea? Be a Theme Camp Operator for a day, an hour or 15 minutes at our Pop-Up Theme Camp booth, with customizable signage!

name: Team Human Base Camp
description: Come get your grilled cheese sandwiches with a side of good/bad advice!

name: Radio Electra
description:
We are your unofficial source during the event for all sorts of real and imagined information. The usual suspects are returning for year 23 broadcasting on playa.  Artists and camps wanting to put the word out on their projects and events are welcome to drop off prerecorded PSA's or just drop in and tell us about it live on the air. You can even meet our questionable Dj and engineering talent.
We only ask a small favor. Please don't tell our families and church friends we are at Burning Man, they still think we are spinning tunes in a Brothel.

name: Apokalyptika
description: We are proud to be an eco conscious kamp that strives to re-envision waste materials into art. Come chill out with us and have a beverage in our post Apokalpytikally themed sunset bar and 24 hr lounge, or play with our eclectic collection of installations and games.

name: Nowhere Portal
description:
An intimate and immersive purgatory experience into the before and afterlife. Come join us when the sun is down and the portal is open to all wishing to journey through. Be born into purgatory and our loosely trained Afterlife Consultants will serve you hot sake and miso while contemplating life's innermost questions.

Find us on special nights for our Purgatory Party because purgatory can also be a sought out destination too.

name: Patsy's Hangout
description: Patsy's Hangout is a fabulous lounge in the gayborhood where you can connect with old friends and make new ones while enjoying a refreshing cocktail. Enjoy high-energy tunes, good company and a comfortable space all day, every day. Stop by for our daily recurring activities including: Patsy's Lounge, which is always open, Patsy's Classical Morning Brew: Serving coffee with classical chill music every morning 9 AM to 12 Noon and Patsy's Bar: Serving cold beverages, and lots of ice, every day 12 Noon to 7 PM. Participate in our daily special events including our dueling pianos happy hour on Tuesday, Wednesday and Thursday, Patsy's Closet on Monday, Patsy's Nail Salon on Tuesday, and our Cubs and Otters and Bears, Oh My! on Thursday, among other daily special events.

name: Servants of the Secret Fire
description: Servants of the Secret Fire have been bringing dazzling LED and fire art to playa while hosting fire spinning jams and flow workshops since 2015. Come check out our library, dance to our DJ sets, or cuddle in our puddles - look for the burgundy/red/orange/yellow dome!

name: Cosplay Central Casting
description: Please cone an "play" with us!   We are a camp that hosts Cosplay events and Cosplay scavenger hunts as well as out interactive "Barbie, Ken and Burner Grr" boxes to dance in.  We are hosting a TUTU Tuesday march/ride to the man on, you guessed it - Tuesday!!  So come by and meet us and have some fun with us!

name: Cosmica
description: Cosmica is the place where rationals and mystics meet. Dip into the cosmic theater, take a meditative journey through the stars, dance to galactic tunes at our Cosmic Feel party.

name: Sunrise Diner
description: The Sunrise Diner is a retro diner serving breakfast and coffee daily to help feed the hungry, the hungover, and the happy-to-be-here burners every morning. Come join us every morning to jam to throwback tunes while waking up right!

name: Blintz Co
description: Food-based camp out of Sacramento dedicated to the art of making blintzes.  We are a less-than 30-person camp, focusing on strong collaborative and communal efforts.

name: Keeping it Wheel
description: Our Onewheel boot camp helps intrepid burners get a first fun experience on a Onewheel, spreading the stoke and teaching them how to ride safely.  This year we will expand the fleet of Onewheels and will add electric unicycles to the training program as well as a trick clinic for advanced riders.  Our park includes a technical parkour, open anytime to more daring and skilled Onewheel and bike riders.  We are again organizing a Playa-wide Onewheel/unicycle floating party group ride to Deep Playa, and are running the first ever Playa Onewheel Rumble/jousting competition.

name: Brainy Bar
description: A neighborhood dive bar that welcomes dreamers, schemers, and big thinkers. Come share ideas with like-minded individuals. Schedules and activities will be posted out front. Time travelers welcome.

name: Camp Brewhaha
description:
Morning Coffee with a bit of fun... Tea and cocoa?... probably
Sandblasted gift mug?....Maybe
Bike Repair?...You Bet!

name: Camp Chomp and Stomp
description: We are chomping, boozing, stomping and snoozing. We are making moves and most certainly shaking grooves. Most importantly at Chomp and Stomp, we are keeping it real – our own small-batch mythic variety of real. We have designed our structure and activities to radiate these values and make them accessible to everyone we meet. It is our honor and great pleasure to share what we hold most dear with the great people of Black Rock City.

name: Solid City
description:
We're mothers, daughters, siblings, and partners – and maybe a cuz or two – parts of a grown-ass family camp encouraging strong bonds among Black and brown Burners and their families  ~ and what better way to do that than by tossing them in an ESCAPE ROOM laced with puzzles forcing you to use critical thinking skills!?  

If you can make it through our 90's cityscape and out the other side to our street meat and Notorious B.A.R. still friends, then you know your relationship back in the Default will be SOLID!

name: Alter Ego
description: Camp ALTER EGO creates experiences through art that challenge and expand one's sense of self.

name: Mycodelic Forest
description:
We are a mycologically based theme camp located in the 3 O clock sector. We love mushrooms and all fungus related things!
Like the mycelium that connects the roots of the forest, the Mycodelic Forest serves to connect the humans that pass through it.
Come sit in our shade and have a cold home brew beer while listening to a wide variety of music. You may learn something!

name: pandemonium
description: Where chaos becomes joy and pain becomes pleasure. Our camp is an eclectic mix of kink, acceptance, and love.  Explore and embrace your kinky side with some rope bondage or flogging. We've got some classes for learning and our camp is always open to impromptu BDSM scenes.  Check out the views from the top of the pyramid or try your talents on our lyra.  Last but not least, our 6 ft tall Flaming Heart is a sure bet for some magical pics.

name: Toxic Disco Clam
description: In the default world, the Toxic Disco Clam is a real aquatic creature. It uses its luminous lips to attract passing fish... and then it dazes them with acidic snot. We're pretty much the same: we draw you in with dazzling lights and entertaining activities, we ply you with our intoxicating beverages, and we hope you never leave.

name: Silver City
description:
Ice cream and beer daily 11-4
 Mechanical bull and games

name: Camp Eddy Out
description: We are a salty group of river rats who got eddied out for far too long and have lost our way.... We dally, role play, keep people from getting where they want to go, lure them in with bait, take them fishing, compete in games and generally keep them going in circles. Where were you going? No one knows... got eddied out a while back!

name: Miso! (formerly Miso Horny)
description: Come join Miso! for late night miso soup and sake underneath our 20 ft bar tower. Enjoy our consent based workshops and events during the day in our event space.

name: Fairy Wood
description: Replica BRC street signs, tech charging, clothing boutique and swag swap.

name: 7 Sirens Cove
description: A pirate bohemia where merrymaking, mermaid lounging, dancing rhythms and mischief run aground. Beware, it is futile to resist the 7 Siren's call!

name: Flaming Ugly Cowboy Saloon
description: The Flaming Ugly Cowboy Saloon offer a variety of amusements every afternoon: bar games, bull rides, and the coldest beer and cider this side of the Quinn river. Just don't walk through our wall.

name: Frizz
description: Camp Frizz, a chill cafe & bar to come retire at!

name: Camp-Lemon-Tree
description:
Has life been handing you too many lemons? Was the last "F*ck Your Burn" your final straw? Is your cup already full and you'd like to fill someone else's? Welcome to Camp-Lemon-Tree! The complimentary compliment camp with a Compliment Cohort ready to commend! 

Stop by one of our afternoon Happynings to participate in the following activities: 
Ice Cold Lemonade (virgin or alcoholic)   
Compliment (Post) Cards - Mail home a Black Rock City Post Card 
Fish for Compliments - "Fishing" for fun prizes 
Compliment Sandwiches - Hot-n-fresh Pizza Quesadillas
Music!

name: Camp Scatter
description: CAMP SCATTER pays tribute to the all but forgotten Prince of Mayhem, Elvis' chimpanzee, SCATTER PRESLEY, who once reigned over GRACELAND with a bottle of Bourbon and an unbridled libido. This pampered CHIMP was draped in the finest studded jumpsuits and was known to be the life of the party. We celebrate our friendly furry fiend with daily shenanigans and nightly Elvis movies featuring the most unruly interruptions at our legendary BANANA HAMMOCK THEATER. Stop by and swing with us; grab a banana rum shot or an ice-cold beer and put your monkey feet up.

name: The Spanktuary
description: An inclusive celebration of the art of spanking, from sensual to butt beating. Join us in the revelry and have fun at our "Spankin' and Bacon" party on Wednesday afternoon at 3 pm.  Bring your old friends and make new ones as you enjoy the love of spanking on the playa!

name: DustyDelight
description:
Cooling off the playa since 2019.
Serving up delicious playa-made ice cream & frozen facials.

name: Barbie Day Spa
description: Come to the SPA!  Fingernail painting, vinegar foot baths, body wash, massage, refreshing drinks, and relaxing chill space.  Get pampered on the playa.

name: Space Jr
description:
We're not from Earth; From far away!  We travel Space and Time, so we already know about all the embarrassing shit  you do at next year's Burn. Don't sweat it, we'll still let you hang.

2023 will be our 50th Burn on Playa, so celebrate with us! Voted best camp by the Intergalactic Better Business Bureau.

name: Hang-Out, the
description: it retreats into itself, an elusive camp providing nature's most relaxing environment—shaded hammocks, theopsiadelic as they rustle in the wind. In the language of ethereal syllables and innuendo, as individuals discuss the many adventures that have befallen them since they first set eyes on this dusty land. come find your respite…perhaps your soul.

name: Camp Fruits And Nuts
description: Come share the shade and a cool drink in our street side living room with the gang at Camp Fruits & Nuts. Add your two cents to the discussions at our daily Salon, drop in for some trivia or do a little knitting. All are welcome in our LGBTQ+ space.

name: PlayAlchemist
description:
As citizens of Black Rock City for several years, we observed how the ingredients of Burning Man caused a transformation in all who experienced it. 

PlayAlchemist was born out of a dream to bring the gift of a campus designed to further enable deepening of this experience, a container for activation and co-creation of Alchemical personal transformation. 

PlayAlchemist contributes to the interactivity of Burning Man through immersive programming day and night, and the Pyramid is a physical representation of this crucible; of alchemy and of higher consciousness. 

Once inside this 71 ft high, 111 ft base great pyramid, you are initiated to embark on an internal journey of personal transformation through the seven stages of alchemy; while outside, the seven days of Burning Man unfold.

name: Free Photography Zone
description:
Free Photography Zone the longest running photography studio at BM
(25 consecutive years) photographs the participants in a professional studio setting and gifts each person photographed with a print to remember their experience

name: Snow Cone Zone
description: snow cones from 12-2 monday through thursday/ bring your cups. free wifi 12-6 no passwords needed.

name: Airstreameri and What Not
description: Home to Playa's Best PostCards & Dusty Scientific Talks! Because 'nothing to write home about' doesn't apply here & ignorance is NOT bliss. Bring your address book & send some love back to the default world! Special libations & yard games every evening!

name: Epiphany Jewelry Co.
description: The finest jewelry store on the playa.

name: And Then There's Only Love
description:
Home of the world famous Orgy Dome – where couples & moresomes of all orientations are invited to come and play. We welcome all combinations of love!

We're a sex-positive, inclusionary, and exploratory space that's been a place of joy and passion since 2003.

Everyone wishing to enter the Orgy Dome receives a detailed orientation covering Informed Enthusiastic Consent. Anything other than an enthusiastic YES means NO!

Our (relatively) dust free, air conditioned space is designed for people to experience social sexuality in a safe and respectful way. We have a 'Just Us' and an 'Open to More' section – so monogamous & non-monogamous folks are all welcome.

And check out our daily workshops on many different sex-positive topics, hosted by preeminent sex-educators

name: Titicaca
description: Ah, Titicaca.  This high altitude mountain lake is the symbol for our camp.  Unusual, striking, beautiful, and refreshing.  Come by for a friendly chat.

name: PyrOasis
description:
Home of the PyrOasis fire performance group. 
Join us for fire spinning, booty shakin' beats, and mediocre drinks! 
Come to our Milky Disco on Wednesday night at 6pm to see our fire show!

name: Karma Love Camp
description: Come to the starlight and shimmering sunrays and join us where you can discover yourself as the universe discovers itself. From Divine Femininity to transformation's event horizon, an experiential journey of self-discovery and enlightenment beckons you.  Feel the energy and vibration of Karma Love, which is awe-inspiring, all-enabling and all-encompassing. Be with us where you will find mesmerizing and welcoming art that invites wonder and possibility. Enjoy our events that challenge your senses and awareness while honoring YOU.  Karma Love celebrates YOU with body art, wellness experiences, community connection and permission to play.  Share the joy of community with food events, dance parties and gifting. You are the universe in human form.  Karma Love anticipates you!
