name: Vertical Camp
description: Vertical Camp | A vertical celebration of intentional community and how a disparate collection of people from around the world, each bringing their skills and experience to create an exponentially more rewarding experience for each other, and a welcome home to those who happen upon us. We provide new perspective on our collective experience within Black Rock City and tools to bring that experience back into the default world.

name: Anonymous Village
description:
Anonymous Village provides safe, sheltered, shaded venues for 12-step groups to hold meetings and to gather and help one another. We have a drug and alcohol-free space for participants to camp during the event (please pre-register camp with us at www.anonymousvillage.com).   If you are feeling unsafe in your camp because of drug or alcohol use, please consider staying with us for the night or for the event.   If you are curious about burning sober please consider attending an AnyA meeting and learn more.

Contact: info@anonymousvillage.com
Hometown: Gerlach, NV

name: Black Rock Mystics
description: Magic & Miracles in the Dust! We do two shows daily of Magic, Mentalism and Hypnosis, come and get your mind blown! Guaranteed to amaze, stupefy, mesmerize, and produce a chilling sense of wonder and psychedelic bewilderment. We have a booth for psychic readings. Stop by for some impromptu close-up magic and we have been known to teach a trick or two to the enthusiast wishing to learn. Step right up and participate in one of the most memorable and mystical experiences in your Black Rock City adventures.

name: Comfy Cozy Voodoo Lounge
description: Come stick it to the voodoo man! Pin your pains, sorrows, grudges and your vendettas to our 6' tall voodoo man! Brin friends with you and join in a traditional absinth serving while having your tarot cards read. We're inviting you to join for a blacklight voodoo dance party Wednesday night! Don't have a voodoo outfit? We've got body paint to get you covered.

name: Dr. Carl's Collection of Depts.
description: Dr. Carl's Collection of Departments returns! We'll be dusting off a few of the old departments while senselessly adding a few more to the collection. The Department of Collections, our ongoing, sensibly-sized, big-board of stuff will, of course, return asking the city to do, find, or be something. The Theater Department, Department of Strategy, Department of Dispute Resolution, Department of Talks and Discussions, and Department of Boudoir Photography are all ready and waiting to make your participation at the very least, a little more interesting.

name: Paper Cranes
description: Come find refuge from the elements of the Playa. Have an ice-cold michelada or a homemade pickleback at our bar, "The Fold". Or enjoy a hot tea while you listen to some funky beats. Share a wish and write it in an origami crane, and we'll deliver it safely to the temple before the Sunday burn.

name: HELLVetica
description:
HellVetica is a Burning Man camp that celebrates the power and potential of propane. Members of HellVetica are all passionate about engineering and design, and come from a wide range of backgrounds and experiences. 

HellVetica, burning bright
With the energy, of propane ignite
Entropy may rise, but enthalpy's the key
To keep the flames burning, for all to see

name: Bubble TEAse
description: Because Bubbles effervesce joy! Come hang out and enjoy bubble-themed games while drinking (and learning about!) bubble milk tea or bubbly wine. Jump into a huge bubble for Bubble Soccer and, afterwards, break out of your bubble in the bubble lounge. From the team that brought grilled chicken to the playa as Winner Winner Chicken Dinner in 2014 and 2015, we at BubbleTEAse are excited to return for the first time since 2019 with more delicious treats! Newly vegan-friendly, kid-approved, joy-sparked.

name: Fandango
description: 28 years ago people were dumb and came out to party. Now we are a big ole village with members spread all over. Nothing has changed, and everything has changed. These are our people. We are our people. Welcome to Fandango. Be sure to say hello when you stop by for a beer!

name: Catmandu
description: Catmandu is a group of diverse friends who love dumplings, music, and cats. Join us on playa for activities throughout the week like prom, trashy wine tasting, and a cat creation station.

name: Big Idea
description: The Big Idea is a brand new theme camp based in Las Vegas, Nevada. We want to be a central location for anyone and everyone to come work on their brilliant ideas that are inspired at Burning Man. Our 24 hour public workspace called the "Thinking Lounge" includes a library, a study/office space, and art and office supplies available to all. Since innovation is exhausting, and inspiration can come while dreaming; we also offer a comfy lounge with hammocks called "Dreamspace". Come see us throughout the week for tea, a variety of events, and Shabbat Dinner on Friday night!

name: Cafe Diem
description: We are an immersive cafe experience where each cup of coffee or tea is lovingly made. Take a break from the playa and enjoy the ritual of sipping coffee or tea from a handmade cup under our airy shade structure. Stroll around to check out our art, play board games, or socialize and make new friends. We happily serve cold brew and French press as well as a wide array of teas from around the world including classic and herbal varieties, not to mention hand-crafted sodas.

name: BRUNCH Away Republic
description:
Espresso Martinis and Margaritas 10am-2pm daily using locally-sourced organic ice.
Get a new, better Playa Name from our Playa Name Robot.
Take/leave a story/name/secret with our confessional phone booths.

name: Two Lanterns
description: Best weddings on the playa, with all the trimmings!  Department of Wedding Planning is in our camp, consult with the experts.  We're also headquarters for the Society for the Prevention of Cruelty to Stuffed Animals (help care for the animals, please!).

name: Raditude (Formerly Fer Sherbert)
description: An inclusive collective from south of the border and to the north, we bring positive reinforcement and frosty (organic plant-based allergen-free) superfood treats to all desert ANIMALS building, volunteering, and interacting within Black Rock City!

name: Deep Playa Surprise
description: Deep Playa Surprise brings the magic of the Deep Playa to the citizens of Black Rock City by offering daily gifts of culinary and artistic delight. Home to the art installation Sunset Series with Artists of BRC, offered to those who wish to take a transformational and artistic journey into Deep Playa

name: Camp Questionmark
description: Something different for burners, by burners. Come enjoy a desert experience & help keep Burning Man weird )?(

name: Whiskey Division
description: Nerds, Booze, Kids

name: Steam Bath Project
description: The first and still the best steam bath on the playa. Since 2001 we have been providing a unique and transformative experince at Burningman.

name: Metal-Morphosis
description: Camp Metal-Morphosis- Transforming an ordinary disc of copper into an embossed, uniquely stamped piece of wearable artwork made by you. Participants learn an ancient metalsmithing technique using special tools.

name: Half-Ass
description: Camp Half-Ass is a group of fun loving individuals that has been bringing Peace, Love, and Laughter to the Playa since 2006. Come enjoy our infamous Bike Bar, Art Installations, and Beer Garden Parties.

name: 1st Bank of BRC
description: We are the bank for all to thrive in the gifting economy, and we have what you need! Visit the bank each day during business hours, or visit one of our 24 hr ATMs to make a deposit or withdrawal. We offer all kinds of services that you could've never imagined. Deposit your gift at the bank, we will find a good giftee and take their gratitude in exchange. You can come back later to withdraw the gratitude left by the recipient of your gift. If you're looking for a challenge, then dare to break into our high security vault. Excellent customer service is sometimes guaranteed.

name: dust & stars
description:
this is dust & star's tenth year as a placed theme cult.

that's right: we're a cult. for years, we've donned black robes and warned other burners the endless night was coming. for our 10th anniversary, we're back with an even more important message for black rock city:

WE TOLD YOU SO.

well… kind of. we got some stuff right. but while the endless night has been doomy, gloomy, and long (so long!), we're starting to think it might not actually be endless. in fact, the horizon is getting brighter — and from what we've glimpsed, there's a breathtaking new dawn on the other side.
literally breathtaking, and shiny.
blinding, even.

we welcome all who dare.

name: tldr village
description:
tl;dr village is the home to cozy dino, dumpling trap, and afterlife mutant vehicle! 

the dumpling trap is an old-school neon Chinatown lounge that serves dumplings, plays trap, and engages guests in deeper conversations. 
cozy dino is a safe and cozy place to party, relax and meet new friends. during the day, come escape the elements in our cozy shade structure where we'll be serving ice cold flavored seltzers and enjoy our workshops/lectures!

orrrrr come by in the evening to grab a cold beer while you listen to music and dance at our nightly party. orrrrr lastly, hop on our art car - After Life - as we head out for sunset rides or catch us for one of our midnight lectures.

name: Critical Connections
description: We are alive when we are connected. We are a camp that celebrates connections. Every day we offer puppet shows, tea, boozy cotton candy, live pianos and sparkly lights to look at past bedtime.

name: Dymaxion
description: We create dwellings that are artistic, comfortable and able to survive the most extreme weather effortlessly. We achieve this by using a rare but incredibly versatile dome geometry that is based off an Archimedian solid. With this geometry we can build metal, cloth or foam panel domes that are infinitely reusable. Some of our domes have had 9 years of playa use and are as solid as the day we made them. Stop by and see our latest iterations

name: Black Hole Literary Society
description: GROW OLD, NOT UP! By day we offer a shady place to lounge, hydrate, color, and play. Gentle yoga in the AMs. After dark, immerse yourself in our 3-D blacklight experience - flow to some vibey tunes, create a visual masterpiece on our Giant Lite Bright, and get warm at the campfire. Join us till late on Thursday night for the 4th Annual 'Elvis Hour' around 8pm followed by a night of 'music with words': tunes through the decades and psychedelic rock of yesteryear. Friday we welcome ALL for the 5th Annual Shabbat Potluck at sundown - bring some food to share or simply come and enjoy! We dig high fives, bad jokes, hula-hoops, and nerdy knitters. Catch a ride on the The Waving Jelly Art Car or grab a book from the Lie-Barry. Up is down at this janky camp. COME PLAY, we've missed you!

name: FURngully
description: FURngully is a place of relaxation, a place to explore, to find yourself, to find someone else. A place to gain some perspective with a little altitude.

name: Argonauts
description: Cherish the uncertain, challenge fear, welcome the odd, and seek thyself!  The Argonauts bring a unique and infectious spirit which we share across the playa and in conjunction with reenergizing camp activities including our ArgoShine-enhanced induction ceremonies and high-noon ArgoDogs. Besides our Argonaut spirit, our gifts include Argonaut dust, sun & fashion bandanas, temporary Argonaut tattoos, and spiritually-assigned individual Quests for each newly inducted Argonaut for the coming year.

name: Salon Soleil
description: Salon Soleil is a welcoming space for personal exploration, self-expression, wacky antics, and profound interaction with other beings. We invite the Black Rock City community to visit our plush and welcoming Do-Me Domes, shake your body at our Tuesday night funk dance party, audition for silent-movie stardom, be transformed by our life-changing Healing Faire, engage in interactive workshops, try on a new look, or gather around our burn barrel on a cold night and make new friends We offer a safe space to decompress, meet new humans, and reconnect with yourself. We also welcome power hungry devices and depleted batteries that can be filled at our solar charging station!

name: The Salty Start & the Peppery End
description: Come get your Fresh Sausage!  Grilled sausage on a stick, served until they're gone.

name: Pranksters in the Pines
hometown: South Lake Tahoe, Reno, Las Vegas
description: Forest theme camp that likes to fuck with people. Come have some laughs at your expense.

name: Atlas Camp
description: Atlas is a community of volunteers, dreamers & doers who get together to create unforgettable experiences. This year we're bringing the xTent to Burning Man: a 7 Dimension Sensual Sound & Light stage that can host 400 guests with live DJ performances mixed with Fire, Water Misters, Fog, Wind, Lights, Lasers & Projection Mapped Walls.

name: Camp Byte This
description:
BYTE is a fully immersive art experience featuring two furry and lovable robots named "Chip" and “Terra".

Camp Byte This is BYTE's offurcial fluffy camp that welcomes everybody! Swing by to check out our new mutant vehicle and furiend "Petabyte", get some beautifully designed BYTE gifties, grab one of our special cocktails, dance your dusty butts off to any one of our exceptionally gifted music artists or get poked by our holy acupuncturist!

name: La Palma Borracha
description: As burners bike up to our colorful camp, they will be welcomed by energetic beats, heckles from a megaphone, and a number of ways to enjoy our camp. Come play cornhole, relax in our shady hammocks, or join us Monday / Wednesday / Thursday afternoon for some drinks, dancing, and fun beats! We'll be hosting our very own DJs who will be spinning funky jams, house, and some old school hip hop. We are the perfect lil' oasis you didn't know you were looking for.

name: Octopus Garden
description: Octopus Garden is a psychedelic underwater lounge and game room with late-night music and vibrant, funky vibes.

name: Post Oppression Colony
description:
A post in the present, to a future beyond the past. 
At the most fun vision of the inevitable, post-climate-apocalypse.

A safe-haven for BIPOC and all other post-oppressed individuals to unite towards a post-colonial, post-oppression future, at Black Rock City and beyond.

Let's prep our people, our gear, our tools, and our techniques for the future, in the present. For the harshness, and the Beauty that lies beyond survival, daily:
 - Make Ceramics in Wood Burning, Fire-breathing Dragons
 - Bike Repair, Tools and Training 

Let's remember where we came from, the fires that forged our iron and mettle. Share our stories, our jokes, our strengths and our weaknesses. Daily: 
 - Marginalized Music Morning
 - Empowering People of Color Open-Mic 1–4pm

 Open build week too. Find us in the mPOC Neighborhood.

name: Need A Minute
description: Sometimes you just need a minute. Need a Minute embodies childlike play, silliness, and free expression with experiential minutes, amazing music, and activities to connect with open-hearted friends and acquaintances. Stop by the Need a Minute Booth to spin the Wheel of Time and see what kind of minute is in your future. (is it really the minute you needed?) Or stop by our parties where we'll be serving the very best minutes you'll have all week.

name: Bad Education
description: Welcome to the Bad Education! We collect and spread the worst Bad Education – because what we teach can't be any worse than what you learned in the default world. We're a camp of burner inbreeds that welcomes everyone, except for those who don't play nice. Our front porch and shaded hexagon dome structure are always inviting. Our classes and school themed dance parties are the talk of the block, featuring school themed interactivity, nap time, recess and P.E. So come join us, embrace the Bad in our education system and leave with more useless knowledge then you had the year before, because the education we provide can't be any worse than what you got in the real world.

name: Lost Art
description: We are Lost Art, a small theme camp of 20-30 people who bring the gift of the Lost Art of Conversation Cafe to playa. We are a highly community based and collaborative camp and our goal is to foster meaningful connections and lasting bonds both within our camp mates and in the interactivity we bring.

name: Pink Fuzzy Monkey
description: Love to play, dance, and monkey around. Our lounge will be spinning tunes for every taste throughout the day. We love playing music throughout the day, with a more intimate experience on our 20x30 dance floor and 600‐watt sound.  Monday is the our 9th annual Super Hero Underwear Monkey Party with tasty monkey juice at the Monkey Bar (alcoholic or not). Throughout the week, we will keep the playa charged up with our fruit charging stations and entertained by playing Monkey Mayhem. Tuesday and Thursday morning/early afternoon dance/hangout parties. With a large community shade structure we invite anyone to stop by and chill for a bit, get out of the sun, and meet new friends, any time of the day.

name: Corn'r Store
description: Welcome to the Corn'r Store! We are part daytime dive bar, part cornvenience store.  We will be serving up all things corn; popcorn, kettle corn, corn nuts, corny jokes, corn quesadillas, walking tacos,, and all sorts of non corny things such as toothbrushes, tampons, condoms, soap, eye drops, etc. Stop by to escape the sun and play some board games, grab a needed item from our cornvenience stand, and lounge around with a refreshing drink. Late at night we plan to wind things down and create a safe space for people to relax and decompress.

name: Stoop.
description: GOOD JOB! You made it to Burning Man. Now come on down and get STOOPid with us. Explore you inner child with games, heckling, random acts of wonder and befuddling art, clowning, gooning, and general mayhem. We also have refreshing tea, a lounge, hammocks, and shade if you don't like having fun.

name: Joujou
description: Our camp is a multicultural, multi-sensory oasis that offers live concerts, panel talks, and workshops that celebrate our diversity. The camp's atmosphere and aesthetic are inspired by ancient intelligence, from Native American sacred geometry to Middle Eastern Bedouin symbolism. JOUJOU is built around the ethos of inclusive and dedicated hospitality. We welcome all at our communal tent and lounge for our open series program.

name: Khan You Not Conform
description: Have you ever seen someone on playa who looked like they were the most likely to get caught in a dust storm, or the biggest flirt, or simply the most captivating and inviting individual and wanted to recognize that individual? Well now you can! Introducing playa's first absurd awards camp. Come by and make a custom award for that special someone, vote for award nominees, tell a story during our story hour, or just relax and listen to random people vent on stage. We also have kid friendly events too!

name: Stimulation Station
description: Most of what we learn from the world around us is due to perception, cognition and activities are mediated through vision. SO what happens if we take away sight and focus on other stimulations like touch, sound and smell? Come check out Stimulation Station, service of soothing touch, peaceful sounds and beautiful senses M-F 12pm-3pm While your there enjoying our cozy seating and games in our brightly colored Geodome!

name: SomeDay Isle ...
description:
SomeDay Isle...  Bar and Broth'l
Inspiration Destination and Late Night Orientation Staytion.
We encourage you to find your dreams.

name: Doggenheim Gallery
description:
Need to get away from the party and chill out?  Come by our 24/7 interactive art gallery to enjoy the vibes, paint and check out artwork created by your fellow Burners.

Our gallery guides will be in from 11:00am-2pm daily to help you discover YOUR fursona and bring you closer to your inner animal. Refreshing beverages will be served.

PET DOGS, create art and chill out!  Check out our events in the WhatWhereWhen guide. Be sure not to miss our gallery opening party on Thursday from 2pm-5pm to celebrate the artwork that people have created throughout the week!

name: Infinite Love
description:
Celebrate love in all forms: self, body, animal, multiple and other. Enjoy yoga, dance, music, tea, and cozy lounges. Rich in daytime programming and shade from the dessert heat. We welcome your animal.

Look for the infinity symbol twisted into a heart.

name: Enchanted Booty Forest
description: The Enchanted Booty Forest is the gathering point for a worldwide collection of artists, thinkers, media creators, scientists, healers, teachers, jokers, professionals, and other amazing and humble humans. Our aim is to cultivate our community, and through collective creation and engagement, share our values of growth, connection, and learning.

name: Harmonic
description: Harmonic is a Synthwave themed bar and restaurant featuring synthwave music, lighting displays, a unique bar, and a boutique restaurant.

name: PlovKraft
description:
PLOV - delicious pilaf every single day!
Come join us daily at sunset to dance, eat, make friends and enjoy!

name: Pickle Joint
description: The pickle joint Hey friendly neighborhood bungalow circus wizard bordello bar.

name: Eurotrash Sangria Bar
description: Serving the best sangria and playing music from around the Latin world every afternoon, 3 pm to 7 pm!

name: Opera
description: A group of humans brought together by our love for emergent culture & a sense of responsibility towards our spaceship Earth

name: Chalice in Wonderland
description: A cozy rabbit hole with friendly faces, good tunes and an occasional Odd Tea Party.  Come kick back in our comfy cuddle puddle, have irrational conversations, play a round of Playa Croquet.  We're all mad here.

name: Wah-Nah-Shotskee
description: Welcome to a loosely wound summer camp extraordinaire! Wet your whistle with a game of truth or dare to participate in a game of skill. Lounge through the afternoon activities, or turn up with a shot skee!

name: Preservation Village
hometown: San Francisco, New York City, London, Los Angeles
description: Preservation Society: A Garden Oasis in the Desert

name: Dusty Beavers
description: We are the Dusty Beavers. We are a camp at Burning Man. We are from Québec, Canada, France, and the US. We bring love, joy and maple goodies to Burning Man!

name: MAD Recreational Movers
description: Chicago-based, home of the ChiCargo community shipping program.  Mon-Wed: Radical Self-Espresso & Affogato bar.  Thur-Sat: Immediacy Phone Spa.  24/7: check out our renewable energy micro-grid.

name: Serpent Moon
description: Serpent Moon is a diverse camp that celebrates the love and connection of humanity.  Join us for 10 Principle themed yoga and breathwork to revitalize your Burn spirit.  Our Serpent Moon art piece is visible during dusk and early nighttime, accompanied by soft beats and easeful smiles.  We look forward to early morning exploration and moonlit kisses with you.

name: Aerial Screw
description: No aerial antics here, for 2023 we're exploring the cultural intersection of chess and hip-hop.

name: Bitchin' Noodle Shop
description: Stop by and make a reservation for a bowl of fabulous pho. We are an inclusive camp with many different folks from around the world with many walks of life. Our collective camp goal has been to provide a place in the shade to rest your feet and enjoy some noodle bowls with friends and family-- but make a reservation. We fill up quickly.

name: Possible Muertos
description: Wake up from the dead with Possible Muertos! Join us for morning movement classes (yoga, stretch, calisthenics), afternoon drinks and game themes from around the world.  Our camp features a shaded lounge with bar as well as a double-decker dome available to kick back, relax and take in the playa views.  Other camp features include lawn games, art walls, instant photos and a misting/hydration station open during public events. Stop by daily between 10am-6pm.

name: Dark Heart Camp
description:
Morning community dance followed by small, intimate heart-share pods? Incredible afternoon expansive workshops? Sunset rituals? Fire art? Nightly temple celebrations of intimacy and joy?  Yes, yes, yes, yes, yes.

Start with our Cafe on the Edge, where you can look forward into the mystery and consider what you're going to leave behind. Take the leap into our Dark Temple, where you can plug into the void and remember what all-is-love really feels and looks like and how to bring that heaven to the heart of the playa - you!

Come drop in with our camp of experienced, international burners who are focused on creating a loving, tight community and flowing the love out to all of you BRC citizens! We love you!

name: Bearwhalea
description: They frame the wildest theories upon the most irrelevant facts, or upon the merest fancies. Mr. Darwin thinks that whales may be bears which have enormously increased their bulk, washed their paws into fins by constant swimming, and stretched their mouths by keeping them open to catch insects in the water. So also he thinks that men and women may have been developed out of monkeys, monkeys out of mushrooms, and mushrooms out of " monads," or little clots of jelly. Where is the proof? Where is a single instance of a bearwhale, or a man-monkey, to be seen? Of course there is not one.

name: EZ Tiger
description: EZ Tiger is a watering hole with music. Yes, there are libations - please wrangle one from the bartender and nurse it slow. There's sound art here, too. It's loud enough to feel. But we're NOT set up for a sea of zombie ravers throbbing in front of a DJ pulpit and an endless row of speakers. This is a place to explore sound and space on your own terms. There's plenty of shade and comfortable seating - you can find a place to relax or conversate. And of course there's room to dance, if you please.

name: Symbio
description: Home of the Dirty Owl and Dr Hoot

name: Camp Juicy
description:
CAMP JUICY is celebrating 10 years of playa smoothies! Mon-Fri afternoons we have beats and fresh fruit and ICE to juice up your day!
Bring everyone and a cup. Sno-cones too.

name: Afterglow
description: Afterglow, that wonderful feeling that lingers long after the experience has elapsed—a feeling that only occurs when the mind, body, and soul has been ever so stimulated. Our gift to the Playa and to its dear citizens is Afterglow!

name: Mary's Little Lambs
description: Mary's Little Lambs is an inclusive, mostly queer camp made up of a core group of 12-15 people that has grown larger and stronger each year since our inception 4 years ago.  We celebrate our community, live out the 10 principles and bond as a family both on and off playa.

name: Dickhead Camp
description:
Come experience the best most obnoxious bar on the playa were nothing is as it seams and not only will the drinks be confusing but the art is beyond your imagination. 
Incline Village lake Tahoe

name: Disfunktion
description:
We are a multi national /racial family camp of 6 -7 years.
We aim to provide daily food and drinks as well as night time music in a warm /cozy and party environment with flames , lights laser.
We provide Human Weebles as an original means of interactivity.
Please come join out wibley wobley world!

name: Slushious
description: Slushious offers afternoon dance parties with cold drinks and world class DJ's under a shaded dance floor and lounge.  Join us for an afternoon of legal revelry, shake your tail feathers at our animal-themed dance party, find your inner zen at our yoga sessions, or come celebrate leaving something unwanted behind at our divorce party. Whatever your mood, Slushious has something to offer. After the party ends head to our on-site Whinery Dome for a wind-down glass of wine and to share your frustrations - we're here to listen and commiserate!

name: Po9
description: We connect you with the world, we are the original way to get USPS mail to the playa, as we have been for decades. We do: USPS to the Playa, Playa to any (international) address with a unique artistic postmark! (US postage encouraged/required), and friendly (and not-so-friendly) posties: stand in line, and fill out your form... in triplicate... with crayon.

name: Dusty Mule Saloon and Playground
description: The vibe of belly laughs all day everyday. We have a large colorful dome with a welcoming bar and refreshment offerings with a daily music theme. We serve boozy beverages and a few iced non-alcoholic ones. Interior games include Yard Yahtzee, Pin the Man on the Ass, Truth or Jenga. We have smaller domes connected by tunnels for an adventure. Our playground boasts a wide variety of interactive games to entertain the masses and bring forth maximum laughter. We have large scale Connect 4, Rubber Ring Toss Your Cookies, Shut Your Cornhole, LED Tetherball, What Goes Up Must Come Down (hydraulic teeter totters) and other carnival games. Laughter is the universal love language of friends.

name: Tropical Lunartics
description: Tropical happy hour featuring pina colada slushies (contains alcohol) and spam musubi

name: Cow dit quoi
description: Serving roasted sweet potatoes and tea

name: Lunar Disco
hometown: San Francisco, Santa Rosa, Nicaragua, Puerto Rico
description: Embark on an otherworldly adventure at Lunar Disco.  Embrace the cosmic elements in our electrifying dance and party spaces, with interstellar beats and mesmerizing ambience. Connect with fellow stargazers in our ceremonial space, honoring the celestial bodies and the shared human experience.

name: The G-Spot
description: Often hard to find and always pleasurable location in the warm (sometimes frigid) wonderful lower region of the Black Rock Desert, deep inside the fantasy zone known as Black Rock City where, you may discover an incredible welcoming environment known as The G-Spot! Come on in for a cold glass of Playa Punch!

name: fruitPOP
description: fruitPOP is a gay queer Burning Man theme camp (est. 2019). With events ranging from ridiculous to titillating, we are building a safe, judgment-free, consent-driven space throughout the burn. fruitPOP values creative expression and participation from our fruity members and on-playa guests alike.

name: Camp Pussy Magnet
description: A true love for the feline and all things cat. The purrfect place to pounce on passionate pussys and power up with a photovoltaic pride. Cool kittens with magnetic personalities and just the right amount of love. Whisker lickins optional.

name: Whatchamacallit Whinery
description: What makes a quality whine? Is it how sour the grapes are? Or perhaps how long it stays bottled up? At the Whatchamacallit Whinery, we'll find the answer to that question by collecting gripes from all over the Playa, smushing em up, and celebrating our collective complaining over… well you guessed it, wine!

name: Hooter Tooterville
description: Hooter Tooterville is a small art support camp bringing this year's honoraria installation "Tower of Tooter".

name: Hair of the Dog (HOTD)
description:
HOTD is the first and longest running bar at Burning Man.  HOTD holds a piece of the original fire, and we take that seriously.

We bring the music & the booze, you bring the booze & the music!  HOTD is open until the bartenders pass out, and then we reopen when you get behind the bar.  All performers are welcome, and we'll give you a well lubricated audience.  As long as you're doing it, we'll love it.  Come join us.

name: Pickle Frontier
description: We are a pretty big Dill.  Serving pickle backs and pickle juice to revive the dusty masses.

name: Radical Fashionista
description: Radical Fashionista is a theme camp where both professional and amateur fashion designer burners gift their Burning Man-designed costumes to others through a contest.

name: Pinhole Project
description: The pinhole project provides daily art making workshops and hosts a gallery of the pinhole photography art we create throughout the week. We maintain a large fleet of cameras which we use to document the art and community of Burning Man. We believe this traditional analog form of photography provides a nice contrast for folks to slow down and become more present with art making. Our offering is art making, communal effort, inclusion and gifting. Ideally, we like to take pinhole photographs of playa artists in front of their installations. We believe documenting creators with their work is a delicious form of acknowledgement and provides a wonderful gift.

name: Tacoma is for [GHOST] Lovers
description:
Welcome to the one and only BLACK ROCK SHOE REPAIR!!

Are you tired of wandering the Playa feeling like you are losing your sole? Dusty wasteland wearing holes right through you? You're in luck! BLACK ROCK SHOE REPAIR is here to comfort your worries as well as save your desperate and hopeless soles. With our 24/7 drop off, anytime is the right time to seek rehabilitation. Think your soles are beyond repair? Browse our Ghost Lovers Sparkle BOOT-ique and see if your sole-mate is waiting for you. You know what they say, "If the shoe fits".

name: BurningDREAMS Stage, Fire&Ice Bar
description:
Open live music stage - a couple scheduled performances but mostly a full stage of live instruments ready to be picked up.  You play and we feed and beverage the crowd.
Sometimes its the veggie and carnie gourmet tacos that bring int eh musians...In all cases, there is iced beer, water and a chill zone to relax.

name: Settle This Like Men
description: Slap, Bump, Roll - Brazilian Jiu-Jitsu at 11am daily, also join morning Yoga and Playa Pranyama.

name: Alborz
description: If you find yourself parched and disoriented, listen carefully. Follow the melody and you may just stumble across camp Alborz. We'll be happy to nurture your body and soul before we send you back off to find the next adventure.

name: Ramshackle Bait & Tackle
description: Ramshackle Bait & Tackle, for all of your on-playa fishing needs. If you're not not interested in fishing, come on by!

name: Cloud 9
description:
We are a live music, deep ancestral camp that jumps between mayhem and meditation depending on the day and whether we've had breakfast. 

We wish to preserve clean water for future generations. To that end, we will provide only cold beer to the filthy citizens of Burning Man.

name: Trotsea
description: Live Birds love you!

name: Campus Callosum
description:
Hypothesis: Scientifically rigorous yet playful activities enhance your burn.

Intro: Our science-themed camp, Campus Callosum, is hosting interactive demos, games, workshops, science art, and Q&As… and we want YOUR BRAIN!

Specific Aims:

AIM 1) Founded by neuroscientists and friends, we have a ton of brainy events! Check out our interactive neurotech, operant conditioning games, and expert-led chats on the neuroscience of drugs, the mind and more.

AIM 2) Our speakeasy 'The Double-Blind Pig' is serving placebo-controlled refreshments. Drop in for "Ask a Drunk Scientist" to help us answer the all the questions that emerge from the dust and test your own ability to discern your sobriety.

Don't forget to have a look at our scientifically-inspired art projects on your way out!

name: Native Tongues
description: Native Tongues is home to veteran burners of all colors & backgrounds, brave Virgins who are seekers and people who love life to the fullest.

name: NumbSkulls
description: NumbSkull (mutant vehicle) support camp

name: Amulet
description: Bring out your inner Animalia as you enter our dome with your favorite animal call, bird song or howl at Camp Amulet!  At our Amulet table,  you'll be gifted a brass dog tag; pre-stamped with the Burning Man symbol. Our highly skilled Amulet Counselors will guide and inspire you to customize your Amulet. Using metal stamping tools you can add names, numbers, symbols, astrological signs, and Viking ruins.  We'll put your Amulet on a necklace, keychain or bracelet for you when you're finished.

name: Snarky Marquee
description: If you have something to get off you chest. Stop by the Snarky Marquee and put you words up on one of our analog reader boards.

name: The Breakfast Club Village
description:
The Breakfast Club Village Houses,
Scarbutts Café: serving hot and cold coffee with brisk Spankings 9am-12pm Mon-Fri

Pancake Playhouse: Start your day off with some feel-good jams paired with hot-off-the-griddle pancakes, Monday, Wednesday, Friday 9ish-12ish. And swing by Tuesday and Thursday 3ish-5ish for some disco beats and drinks

Objectification Station: 1pm-3pm Monday through Friday. Come get objectified or get compliments and get rewarded with a delicious quenching  drink.

name: Camp Hotdog
description: We bring the hotdog, we are the hotdog. We relish every opportunity to ketchup with old friends or meat new ones. Hot weiners, cold drinks, cool tunes, what else do you need? We are here to help you find the true condiment of your soul. Stop by the Triple D Diner for the coffee and grilled cheese, but stay for the good ol fashioned camaraderie. What'll ya have, hun?

name: VW Bus Camp and Leopard Lounge
description: "Come to kindly terms with your ass, for it bears you" opens John Muir's How to Keep Your VW Alive DIY repair guide, for the Compleat Idiot. For Animalia we invite all Playa Idiots and would be idiots to visit Bus Camp for our Leopard Lounge and Day Spa where we offer tequila shots, foot massage and clean white cotton socks, Grateful Dyed tie dye party, crafts, camp tours of our asses, I mean buses, and how we feed and take care of these old beasts. We've been doing this on Playa since 1998. To quote John Muir again "The type of life your bus contains differs from yours by time scale, logic level and conceptual anomalies but is "Life" nonetheless. It's Karma depends on your desire to make and keep it Alive!" Camp's "Life" is Equality and Community, come visit and see for yourselves.

name: Astral Outpost
description: A rest stop for astronauts en route to other planets

name: Playa 54
description:
We are a Dance Theme Camp located in the Tokyo sector. Our DJs spin the best of the 80s, 90's Hip Hop, House and More!! 
New this year - guided meditation and self discovery workshops using music.
LET'S DANCE in the Dust Together!!

name: Battle Born Burners
description: The Friendliest Bar On the Playa! Lots of Comfy Spaces including couches and a bar.  We are serving Drinks and Good People.  Its the Bar with Nevadatude! Don't miss our Mimosa Monday and Top Shelf Shot Glass Party!  We are always open for a place to Chill and our Bar is open when ever we are in camp.  We would love to meet you - Come on By!

name: Armageddon Bike Camp
description: It's not the end of the world, it's the safe word! Think Armageddon for all your bike needs. We've been providing bike-love to the 3:00 sector for over 10 years, and we offer professional bike repair daily. Check out our Armageddon Emporium activities while you're here for bike repair. We also host great parties, don't miss our Weds Alley Cat Race and After Party with Funny Bike Demo! Our 28ft dome 'living room' and outdoor shade structure provide options for the perfect hang-out space, no matter the weather. Open to visitors 24x7. Drop in any time!

name: One Love
description: From coffee to night art tours, we have something for everyone. All are welcome and encouraged to join us at camp or our on our ONE LOVE bus any time!

name: Pablo's Breakfast Cantina & Spa
description: Start your day with breakfast quesadillas, churro pancakes, micheladas, margaritas, spa treatments and dancing!

name: Combat Zone
description: A refuge for late-night Chinese food, music with words, and radical inclusion

name: Global Village
description: The Global Village is one of the largest villages at BRC and comprises of 10 camps coming from all over the world. Each morning, we have saunas, coffee, tea and breakfasts, we have workshops in the afternoon, and evening performances in our large Moroccan tent and our other stages. If you want to connect with an International Burner, you will be successful here.

name: Spoonful of Friends
description:
We are food and people lovers, so we've prepared delicious 3 courses diner that we will serve to 80 lucky campers Mon-Fri at 7pm.
It definitely not a grab'n'go experience but a time to relax, share food and stories with new friends.
You will come for the food and leave with new friends.

name: Jazzy Cat Butts
description:
Jazzy Cat Butts Village features camps Janky Barge, Catmandu, Camp Butter, Once Upon a Teatime and The Black Rock Bandits. 
Our village is focused on the theme of artistic expression of movement through one's own body and physical art. Attend our Art car symposiums, workshops, and village happy hours to learn more about building and designing moving art vehicles.
Come by for sunset tiki cocktails at our Oasis Bar, lounge and dance with us at the Catmandu dome, and have a drink or two at our Teatime Matcha Cafe and the Butter Bar! Our art cars do community ice & recycling runs in the morning.

name: Shitty Glitter
description: Welcome to SHITTY GLITTER, a boutique Bed and Breakfast providing the most luxurious hospitality experience in Black Rock City. Stop by for a rest in the clean white linens on one of our freshly made canopy beds (changed daily) and be sure to chat with a camp concierge to get the most out of your stay. Be sure to swing by The Parlor on Wednesday evening for our breakfast (for dinner) party where we'll be serving breakfast burritos and dancing the night away. If you're in need of some relaxation, check out our in-house spa, SPAcate, where we'll be providing cold Tecate, face masks, massage chairs and other gadgetry to put you in the ultimate state of relaxation.

name: Short Bus Coffee Camp
description: Short Bus Coffee Camp provides Coffee Monday-Friday mornings from 8am until supplies run out.  Come ease into your busy day on playa with some coffee and good company, while listening to pleasant morning beats.

name: Full Send
description: Ready to get vertical (or just chill out)?! Welcome to camp Full Send! We'll help you elevate your playa experience with our 28ft. climbing wall, "Wall-EE" or help you get higher than last night with one of our scenic sunrise tandem para-motor flights over the playa.

name: Bubble Lounge
description: A place to dance, stretch, rest, or refresh - BubLo has been a part of BRC for over 20 years.  Join us in our 40' lounge, get refreshed at the Quickie Body Wash, or have a drink with us at the BubLo libation station.  Take your selfie within our Sphere's Cubed sculpture!  Open to all and all ages, come by and blow a few bubbles! And remember, the softer you blow, the bigger the bubble!

name: Camp Endstation
description: Destination unknown? Camp Endstation is a harbour to the wanderers without direction, to the nomads without path. Our small camp was founded on the idea of providing anybody who stumbles around in BRC with a tiny but memorable experience.

name: Naughty Naked (mini)Village
description: We are a mini village, we pack it small and play big to offer as much to BRC as a few humble burners can! Our main offerings included self serve neti pots, self serve acids to include ibuprofen, probiotics, batteries and kool-aid.... Daily flogging display of our camp manslave, friendly nudity, and tantric sensual space. We also offer conversation around tantra, consent, & ethical multi-amory.

name: Camp Calico
description:
There's no better way to celebrate Animalia than by honoring our furry best friends. Camp Calico's I Miss My Dog Cafe is a community cafe uniting people over our love of all animals.

A colorful dog installation welcomes our guests, who are invited to relax in the intimate ambiance of dog-themed decor. Our on-duty dog-tor (human therapy dog) will enthusiastically greet you and dexterously serve whatever drool-worthy refreshments the house is cooking that day. Sit and stay for dog-themed events.

Staying true to our food-gifting roots, we host hot dog parties, serving traditional and vegan options for lunch. Our day starts bright and early with a sunrise coffee, tea, and kibble cereal bar. Nama-stay for our up-dog morning yoga or stop by for the occasional hair-of-the-dog cocktail.

name: Post Nuclear Family
description:
Post Nuclear Family is our shelter in the nuclear furnace of the man burn. We're born with our biological family and then we find our logical family in the friends we make. Each of us are different artists under a single roof sharing unique interactive experiences.
* Our home is a space for you to explore the universe aboard a Qubit starship
* Transform yourself at the Bazaar Mutation Boutique
* Quantum Animalia Tarot
* Free Electroshock Therapy is available upon demand

Mutants are welcome!

name: Secret Passage
description:
A cat cafe in reverse!  We cats pamper, play with, and offer treats and enrichment activities to you humans- with an aim to nurture, delight, and heal your inner child. 
Ever been to a cat cafe? That place where folks can go to hang out with and give affection and attention to cats? With all the treats, games, coos, and chin scritches you may have asked yourself, "how can I get a life like THIS?" Well, have we got the thing for you.  What if the roles were  reversed and the cats fed, played with, and soothed you? Wanna give it a try? Come on down to Secret Passage Human Cat Cafe. We have treats! Who knows, maybe you'll even get adopted. 
We have 24- hour iced coffee, tea, lemonade.
ICED CHAI PawsittiviTEA, Live cat karaoke singalongs, and other nonsense 11am to 3pm.

name: Burning Sky
description: Skydivers over Burning Man. Come see Black Rock City from 9,000 feet in the air. Watch the skydivers exit the plane while you stay safely inside, and get an exciting ride back to the earth. Gifting rides Wednesday & Thursday 11a-5p. https://burningsky.org

name: Black Rock City Municipal Court
description: Black Rock City's first and only municipal court. Our judges are here to mediate, inebriate, and educate. Please stop by for legal discussions, model bar exams, public and private mediations, and the Black Rock City Municipal Court.

name: Mos Eisley
description: Mos Eisley. You will never find a more wretched hive of scum and villainy. We must be cautious.

name: Rumpus
description: Non-electronic beats, power invocations, and cool misters for your hot body.

name: Camp TeaPunk
description: Camp Teapunk (Steampunk without the S and M) - Our speciality is being good neighbors and making you feel welcome either in our camp (if you're lookingn for a new home on the playa) or as a visitor in our Steampunk Tea Tent. With deep couches, a plush cuddle puddle and caring greeters you'll always feel welcome. We start our mornings with coffee, tea, fresh bakes treats and sweet DJ beats. By lunch time we are serving up free hot dogs, libations, and ice-cold towels for your sweaty brow (and other bits). In the afternoon our healers hold time and space for you to celebrate self and bring more light, love and flexibility into your life. We welcome dusty bums in our Tea Tent at any time, and provide a welcome respite during white-outs and blazing temps with ice water and fans to be shared.

name: Entheos
description: Members of the Entheos Community organize one of the larger and most diverse theme camps placed at the annual Burning Man event in the Black Rock Desert of Nevada. Friends and members of the Entheos Community come from over 43 countries to contribute their effort, skills, and resources to the creation of Entheos @ Burning Man. The camp creates extensive 24/7 interactivity for all ages as a gift to the citizens of Black Rock City, functions as a pilgrimage home for its members, and serves as a nexus to meaningfully connect people from around the world across national, religious, and ideological lines. As part of Entheos' commitment to radical inclusion, diversity, and equity, we hold a significant portion of our camp capacity open each year to welcome people who are new to Entheos.

name: Thump Drippins
description: Your neighborhood stop for shady drinks and sexy beats. Take a load off on our loungers and hammock tower, dance to some tunes, get lucky in the Hutch, and top it off with a Bad Decision at our bar.

name: Twisted Swan Celtic pub
description: Come escape the burn at the burn.  Enjoy and ice cold pint of whatever is on tap or just some whiskey to warm the sub cockles of your heart.  We are a geeky Celtic pub and we like it that way.  Come tilt your glass to whate'er may come.

name: Size Doesn't Matter
description: We are a small camp but we pack a punch!  You might stop by to grab a pair of sunglasses, and before you know it, you'll be running a 1/2 marathon with us!

name: Glittery Nomads
description: Welcome to the Glittery Nomads' camp, a community of nomads celebrating creativity, self-expression, and inclusivity. Our camp offers gender-neutral bathrooms, wheelchair accessibility, and a safe space for people of all identities. Our major artwork symbolizes this year's theme of "Animalia," where participants become part of an "animal" and shine their true colors. We are committed to Radical Inclusion, Diversity, and Equity, and aim to foster a culture of empathy and understanding. Join us in creating a transformative experience at Burning Man.

name: Coup de Foudre
description: "Coup de Foudre" is a French idiom meaning both "Bolt of Lightning" and to be "Struck by Love at First Sight". Guided by this metaphor, our group of artists, engineers, and electrical enthusiasts use high-voltage electronics to create surprising forms of beauty and new modes of human sensation.

name: Elementum
description: Earth. Air. Water. Fire. The place to nurture your nature. Experience the balance and amplification of the four elements through yoga, workshops, sound, and dance parties. We provide flow, connection, and restoration for people of all identities and points of view. Home of the Space Cow People and the MIDNIGHT SAFARI PARTY on Thursday. Magic happens here.

name: Camp Codename
description: Join Camp Codename for delicious pizza, surprise and delight in the Blinky Light Tunnel of Love and whole lot of Chutzpah at Hugs and Chutzpah.

name: Bigtime
description:
Welcome to BIGTIME! Our massive shade area will be the perfect oasis for weary burners seeking respite from the blazing desert sun. We'll be serving up refreshing beers and soothing teas every day of the week, so drop by anytime and chill out in our comfy seating area.

We've got a ton of exciting events planned throughout the week, including BIGTIME TIKI NIGHT, Sax Tag, the Spirit Animal Dance Party, a Witchy Nostalgia Sleepover, and the Radical Participation Party.

name: Atom Cult
description:
Start the day with our signature Hot Fusion Pancakes and Winter Brew coffee! 
Cool yourself down with a variety of Ice Cream offerings at noon! 
Fill yourself with Happiness and Joy while exploring the magnificent Sculpture Garden full of surprising immersive experiences! 
Relax and recharge both yourself and your portable electronics in our Reactor Dome!

name: The Hand Lovers Lounge
description: A soft landing space for hands, lovers, lovers of hands, and everything in between!

name: Glam Clams
description: Community! Music! Mischief! At the Glam Clams, we are the family you want to choose. Come connect with fellow burners and relax in our welcoming lounge. Get glammed in our Glam Stations, take part in a workshop and shake your damn booty on our dancefloor. Souls of Black Rock City unite!

name: Brain Freeze Camp
description: We will be back again in 2023 serving the coldest frozen margaritas on the Playa. Our amusement center will certainly entertain you and Power to the People will be available to help keep your electrical devices charged.

name: Mindless Movement
description:
Come empty your mind and be intentionally aware of the present moment via embodied play with our many mental wellness mindLess movement activities and toys. 

"To find your heart you've got to lose your mind"

name: Love Puddle
description: Love Puddle is a daytime bar with the friendliest bartenders around. We want to hear your stories and share a cold drink with anyone who wanders into our camp. We offer dildo jousting, strip Rock Paper Scissors, penis snatch, four square and more. Come check us out!

name: What Would You Do For A Pickle?
description: Come join us and play the Pickle Game and find out what YOU would do for a pickle! Spankings sold separately.

name: Temple of Bacchus
description: Come sit a while and rest that weary head.  Bacchus is ready for you child of the burn.  Cool breezes and lounging accommodations await.   And of course libations from 14:00 - 20:00 or just a nice cool glass of water.

name: Square Zer|o|
description: Square Zero represents the place of imagination before the start of a journey, prior to square one, a space to reset and choose your direction. Come participate in our RESET ceremonies, afternoon workshops, morning acroyoga classes, a rest in our chill lounge, and other interactive events. Also, find us in deep playa serving arepas!

name: Dustfish
description:
DUSTFISH home of the Power and the Glory and the Beauty of Love!
For our 23rd year, we are serving Pho, providing LIVE entertainment, and hosting Meta Phoenix Mutant Vehicle

name: Burning Band Camp
description: Burning Band Marching Band

name: Martha Love
description: Martha - Sharing Love; Jump on board and enjoy the loving company, visit the artists, and the best beats in Black Rock

name: Illuminaughty
description: Illuminate your naughty side! Come visit our naughty carnival Monday-Thursday 4PM-8PM! Challenge yourself to feats of great debauchery! Tuesday and Wednesday, the festivities continue past midnight - just follow the Eye of Providence, high in the sky!

name: Bao Chicka Wow Wow
description:
Visit Bao Chicka Wow Wow to taste our buns!
Fill your belly with our fresh and delicious steamed-to-order pork, red-bean, and custard bao (dim sum buns).

name: Water Temple
description: A place for hydration, reflection, and respect for our precious resource.

name: Robotronia
description:
Fun and unique interactive art including our own Pump-bot game, Mind Eraser, Hotshot the Robot, Humdrum the Washing Machine and others!
Battery charging and electronics repair stations available at most hours.

name: Ofosho
description: Good ramen, a great playa moment! Serving the ramen experience on the playa the last 12 years. Doodle or dance to deep house or minimal techno while you wait, noodlessly polaroid yourself or connect with 100s of fellow burners either noodling around or slurping an irresistible bowl of happiness (we have got you covered vegetarians!). Ofosho memorable!

name: Unfuck Your Burn
description: Has your Burn been totally fucked? Let us help you UnFuck Your Burn! Overheating? Come try our Frigid UnFucker 3000 personal cooling system. Underfeeding? Stop by during Stuff Your Fucking Face events for frozen smoothies, sweet potato fries or warm soups. Heart bleeding? Crawl on in during our integration circles to receive support and help make sense of this crazy fucked up amazing experience we call Burning Man. Our crew of UnFuckheads are here to help you feel all RUFfed up...Royally UnFucked...so that you can explore and play on the playa to your heart's content.

name: Black Rock Socks
description: Creating customized socks for the burn made and designed with love. Join us for some whacky events or just  stop by to say hi

name: Mudskippers Café
description:
We are a radically-inclusive, radically diverse, and radically expressive tight-knit group of straights, bi, gay and unlabeled lovers from LA, SF, NYC, Miami, Montreal Kansas City, Brazil, Argentina, Mexico, Central America, the Middle East, Europe, Australia and everywhere in-between. 
We are a Tribe. We are a Family. We are a Worldwide Network of Friends. We work and play together to make the burn more fun and give bigger to those that come to our theme camp. Come enjoy our fruit smoothies, our amazing dance parties, fun workshops, or just come chill out with us in our lounge! We look forward to welcoming you to our dusty home on the playa!

name: Camp Ephemeral
description: Camp Ephemeral is an oasis of serenity amidst the dusty, chaotic playa. The moment you step inside, you're transported to a lush jungle, complete with hanging vines and hammocks. The centerpiece of the camp is a beautifully decorated tea bar, where you can indulge in the most refreshing cold tea drinks you've ever tasted. The tea drinks are garnished with fancy touches like edible flowers and dried lemon slices, and are customizable with mix-ins and syrups. The vibe is all about serenity and magic, with tea elixirs that promise to transport you to another realm of relaxation. It's the perfect spot to unwind, recharge, and connect with your fellow Burners.

name: Interzone
description: Transport yourself to another time and place as you enter Tangier's International Zone. Grab a book from our Lost Times Library and hang out in our lounge area, open 24/7. Library Loud Hours daily from 3pm-6pm with iced Moroccan mint tea and craft beer on tap!

name: Jurassic Playark
description: A unique camp blending current and mesozoic era with a range of activities designed to encourage group interaction. Swing by early in the week for brontosaurus bingo or try some downward dinosaurs at our morning yoga sessions!

name: Chop Shop
description: We are the best BRC bicycle repair shop. We have bicycle parts and welding.

name: Nest of Magical Creatures
description:
We celebrate the magic in every beautiful creature. We thrive on helping everyone discover the magic within themselves through art, activities and experiences that aid this process.

THE ESS MAGICAL CREATURE HALFWAY HOME cares for Stuffed Animals. Stuffies are magical creatures. Some had great upbringings (they were deeply loved), others were in very difficult situations (they never left the store, immediately donated). They share a common purpose to serve as an Emotional Support Stuffie (ESS) but were abandoned. We provide opportunities for Burners to encounter the ESS's through facilitated interactions with trained docents. Encounters with the ESS's can bring humans back into contact with their most wonderful childhood memories and can help the Stuffies move forward in their lives.

name: Las Brujas
description: Las Brujas takes pride and joy in building a camp centered around community between our campers. We're diverse in age and background, hailing from New York, Los Angeles, San Francisco, Mexico City, San Miguel de Allende, and more.  Mostly known by our village name, La Calaca, our camp name stems from the Spanish word for "witch" as we strive to create mystical Playa magic.  Balancing the adventure of exploring the vast expanse of the Playa with building a home "away from home," our camp is a place for those looking for a dynamic, broad, yet deep Burn. Get lost, but also get found; go deep and also embody pure joy; show up and let it all out with us.

name: The Tiniest Camp
description:
The Tiniest Camp is a place where people can connect and have meaningful conversations. We offer an intimate and cozy environment.
You won't find any grandiose installations or flashy decorations. Instead, you'll find a humble gathering of burners who are there to share stories, ideas, and experiences. The focus is on creating a space that allows for genuine interactions and deep conversations.
It is a testament to the idea that bigger isn't always better. We place a strong emphasis on creating a welcoming and inclusive environment, and create a space where everyone feels comfortable and valued, regardless of their background or beliefs. 
At the Tiniest Camp, you can disconnect from the distractions of modern life and truly engage with the people around you. It's a beautiful thing to witness.

name: Soon to be Infamous
description: Maybe this is the year that Soon to be Infamous finally achieves true Burning Man infamy. Or maybe it was last year. Come find out and get a bike flag!

name: Orphan Endorphin
description: Orphan Endorphin is the camp for the burgin looking to  learn how to burn.  The camp is filled with burners from around the world and we travel to regionals just to be together.

name: Tazii Moroccan Lounge
description: Tazii's chill space and bar...the Tazii tent returns for its 21st year, replete with authentic, lush furnishings from the souks of Marrakesh, warm lighting, and the octagonal Tazii bar, from which we serve top-shelf cocktails (alcoholic and non-alcoholic). Come hideaway within our welcoming walls for occasional events, music sets, and services. Day sleepers can literally chill in our swamp cooler-controlled environment!

name: FUC-Kezhan
description: Welcome to the East Asian Hotel-themed camp FUC-Kezhan at Burning Man, where we invite you to immerse yourself in the rich and diverse culture of China. Our camp is designed to be a place of learning and exploration, where you can discover the traditions, customs, and drinks from a different culture!

name: The Moon Cheese Grill
description:
We're with Wallace & Gromit & still believe the moon is made out of cheese. In their honor, we serve up 13,000 grilled cheese sandwiches throughout the week to the hungry citizens of Black Rock City. Stocked with all different types of bread & cheese, including gluten-free bread & vegan cheese, as well as a range of sweet, spicy, tangy & juicy dipping sauces, we're grilling throughout the night to satisfy the cravings of all those dancing & adventuring late into the night (9pm to 2am, Tuesday - Friday). 

Not only will Moon Cheese be your go-to late-night snack stop, we're also now serving breakfast grilled cheese sandwiches (with egg) 2-3 mornings throughout the week. Check the Who, What, Where for details!

name: Android Oasis
description: Creators of The Android Chill Dome and The Oasis Lounge, Android Oasis offers a refreshing and reinvigorating respite from the heat and harshness of the playa. Come by for misting, massage, mindful music, and a mental break. Stay for the vibes, vines, and vivacious community!

name: School of Black Rock
description:
Need Learnin?
School of Black Rock is Black Rock City's only public school dedicated to teaching the principles of burning man and other useful information including: survival skills, sex education, arts and crafts and physical education.
We provide prom dresses and bow-ties for the prom on Thursday night.
Art class includes: 
- corsage making
- bracelet making
- drawing/painting
Physical Education includes:
- jousting
- stick horse racing
- two square
We have after-school activities including:
4pm Tuesday: Cheerleader tryouts
4pm Wednesday: Troop 69 Girl Scout Troop meeting
8pm Thursday: Prom We provide prom dresses and bow-ties for those in need.

name: Home
description:
Hōme (Camp) is an intimate canvas, a place to which friends, old and new, return.
Hōme "Sunset Spa at Hōme" Lounge is filled with vibey music, spontaneous treats and spa treatments (from fish foot baths and cold towels, to 'quick fix' neck and shoulder massages that will be offered by one of the many 'Homies' who hang out there). From 2pm - 6pm on Tuesday, Thursday and Saturday friends (everyone obviously) will be able to pop in and enjoy a sunset spa treatment of their choice.

name: Pleasant Camp
description: A pleasant place to be.

name: Cheat Codes
description: Cheat Codes is a bespoke analog arcade offering games of wit and dexterity 24/7. Come play with us!

name: Sakenoma
description: Ratchet af sake and bowling

name: Icy Hands CHILLZONE
description: Chill out with the Icy Hands crew as they defrost between midday mercy missions: share cool stories, images and video of those touched by icy hands under the sizzling playa sun.  Learn how to turn a simple block of ice into smiles, goosebumps and a truly incredible shared experience!

name: Playground
description: Playground is an oasis for the intrepid burner crossing the vast expanse of BRC.  Filled with sights, sounds and music, Playground will entrance and delight with fun, fire and dance!

name: Caffeine Oasis
description: Our camp embraces the warmth and spirit of the Sun. We welcome you to gather with friends in our cozy space and enjoy tea steeped in the desert sun and coffee brewed in the moonlight. You can also use the heat of your body to transform magical thermochromic fabric fabric into beautiful artwork that is both immediate and fleeting. Join us in the Oasis to meet new friends, swap Playa stories and create memories.

name: Camp LoveAmorium
description: Welcome home and come on down to the living room, love! At Camp Loveamorium, you're treated like family. Join our green, shaded oasis where there are cuddly spots and couches to rest. We'll feed you snacks, offer you a drink, and ask you about your day. You might even walk into your own birthday party and get a cupcake and a present. No matter if you stay for 10min or 10hours, you're family and we're here to take care of you. In fact, we even run a Dusty Daycare and will look after the kids, so you parents can have a Burning Man date to yourselves. Because that's what family is for.

name: Flat Tire Cafe
hometown: All over the world! Primary hubs in LA and NY.
description: Stop by any morning for some cold brew coffee, a fabulous shaded lounge, or some bicycle repair! Release your inner child and play in our game area, or hang out and chat with some amazing people in our huge shaded lounge area. We have spontaneous happenings throughout the day and a community board to let you know what's coming next.

name: Corner Pocket
description:
Billiards at Burning Man! Corner Pocket Camp is your Black Rock City Pool Hall. We have FULL SIZE TABLES! Come enjoy learning and playing up to five pool games: 8-ball, 9-ball, Cutthroat, 3-ball, and Goonball. We'll have tournaments with awesome prizes and FUNishments, as well as special events such as Strip Pool and Heckle Pool. Also, DARTS!
Monday-Saturday noon-10pm

name: PG Squirt House
description: PG Squirt House is your pre-party haven on the playa, featuring an inviting lounge adorned with plush playa-tech couches and vibrant, neon decor. Unwind with our interactive offerings, including creative drink "squirts" to energize you for the night ahead, trampoline bouncing, and engaging board games. Join us for our "Golden Hour" parties and "Ask the Bartender" series, where experts discuss intriguing topics like neuroscience and conscious relationships. Come experience the warm embrace of our radically inclusive camp, where diversity thrives and unforgettable memories are made.

name: AquaZone Intentional Water Bar
description: Every Day – Intention infused water tastings by your friendly Watertenders, plus! Nail Polish Stations, Tarot, Conversation, Surrogate Playa Parent/Friend Counselor, 24 hour Hydration Refill Station and self-serve waters of intention. Our bottles of various still and bubbly waters each have a positive word inscribed on them. These bottles infuse the water they contain with the specific energy that each word evokes. Our Watertenders guide you through the AquaZone Intentional Water Bar ritual of choosing your intention for the moment. You decide!

name: SexyAF
description: Camp SexyAF is here to help people feel… well, SEXY AF! Through all our offerings, our goal is that you leave feeling more connected to yourself and others, and with a deeper understanding that anything can be sexy, and a deeper sense of what you find sexy is AWESOME AND VALID. From our Happy Hour for pregnant bodies (and those who love them), to our workshops (e.g. Daddy Kink 101, Primal Play, etc) to our Authentic Relating games (sexy edition!), to our Forrest Gump shirtcocking MOOP pickup run, we hope you leave our camp feeling sexy, connected, confident, and playful, and ever more prepared to have the Burn of your dreams.

name: Friki Diki
description: Find this Tiki Bar in Golden Guy Alley for some chill tropical fun.

name: Burning Man T-Shirt Factory
description: Burning Man T-Shirt Factory.  Interactive DIY spray paint BM design art camp. We supply the spray paint and BM stencils.  You supply the clothing, gear, or body to paint your design. Totally interactive. Quick, Easy, and Fun.  Open 24/7

name: Pink Mammoth
description: Pink Mammoth is a 501c3 Non-Profit house music and creative arts collective based in San Francisco. We create an inclusive environment of love, compassion, connection, and self expression both on and off the playa.

name: Node
description: Node is a space to relax and refuel your physical body, so that we can focus our energies on higher pursuits. Start your mornings with some deliciously strong cold brew at 830am and stick around for some luscious beats and great vibes. Come by node at anytime and you never know what type of amazing recharge you will find.

name: Hard Truths
description: Hard Truths is a safe and delightful haven for those seeking intriguing and outlandish truths. Our Hard Truths Booth is staffed with resident Truth Doctors, available throughout the day to provide a healthy dose of truth in a comfortable, intimate, and wacky setting. For those who prefer a gentler approach, we also offer the Soft Truths Lounge where you can relax and rejuvenate to the sweet tones of flattery. With good music, enthusiastic compliments, and unabashed truth-telling, Hard Truths is the place to be. No lies here.

name: Illuminalia
description: Come by in the early morning or afternoon on weekdays for refreshments and flow lessons. See our fire performance at 7pm on Tuesday and Thursday!

name: House of Lepus
description:
Come by Tuesday or Friday morning for an Unwinding of Your Inner Rabbit Hole (meditation/movement)
Hosting Transmutational Tea Hoppy Hour Wednesday and Saturday evenings.
If you find yourself on the Other Side Of The Rabbit Hole, join us to converse and integrate any Burning Man experiences that may be challenging to who we are in the world to which we return.  (1-4 pm Monday and Thursday)

name: Strangelove
description:
Fly the Friendly! 

We're back, offering good company, good music, and premier in-flight service from our base in Black Rock City for 2023. Daily flights of fancy in the comfort of our Mile High Lounge, complete with airplane seats and an airline-themed bar. Stop in- make your connections in comfort, and with plenty of time to spare!

name: Hypnagogia
description: We invite you to the mystical oasis of your dreams – the place where you can experience our legendary no-power air conditioner, kick back on cozy carpets and pillows, and connect with friends new and old. Restore your body, mind & spirit while listening to enchanting music from our camp DJ's or being transported into the depths of your subconscious through guided dance meditation and yoga nidra. Our diverse mix of cultures that we represent will ensure you feel right at home, while also traveling to distant lands. Activate your creative life-force by contributing to our collaborative mural dedicated to HYPNAGOGIA – the transitional state of consciousness between wakefulness and dreamstate.

name: Strong Tonic Center for Vitality
description: Seeking the remedy for your malady? Step right up! Our incontrovertible methods are proven(ish).

name: Camp Corny
description:
Find your spirit animal. Put em on a Pole. Thrust them to the beat. They're out of fucking control!  

Jump into a pile of 1,000 spirit animals and use our state-of-the-art technology to guide your hand to YOUR spirit animal. Then our team of experts will help you put your spirit animal atop a gorgeous party pole. As we all know, spirit animals eat dance, so FEED your new spirit animal, dancing wildly w/your new creation at our insanely joyful day club w/amazing DJ's and music. Relax in our lounge, or on the shaded observation decks with playa scopes, or gaze at the 20' tall, flaming double unicorn arch with bubbles coming out of their butts. 

It's all about joy @ Camp Corny so come n' get some and spread it around. 

Camp Corny - The Friendliest Fucking Camp in the Universe.

name: Cloudy as F*CK
description:
Feel the thunder as we BUFF and FLOG your muscles at Body Werkz, get foggy in the Steamy AF sauna, get wisped away in our evolving sprinkles of frosty bevies -- take flight into the silky skies on our aerial rig - drift away in a dream in our cloud pit!

We are dedicated to raising the hearts, body and souls of the broader Burning Man community through our art, events, and welcoming space. We dew take our fun quite cirrus-ly.

It's never been this cool to throw so much shade!!

name: Ideate
description: We are dedicated to amplifying solutions at the intersection of sustainability, community, and art - to solve our world's greatest problems and build a better tomorrow - as a global community of purpose-driven entrepreneurs, creatives & humans. On playa, we are helping green the burn, hosting interactive workshops, and creating magical artistic experience. Off playa, we are a year round community spreading the Ten Principles, sharing experiences of wonder and joy, and making the rest of the world feel more like playa one day at a time. Come join us!

name: Nipple Pie
description:
Nipple Pie welcomes you to join us for our early night parties, whether it is to stomp our dancefloor or to simply sip on a refreshing cocktail in our cozy lounge.

At the start of the new night, when our projectors launch their state of the art 3D projections onto our 50ft mural, and when the beats roar up to the busy avenue,  that's when Nipple Pie shines the best

name: Gong Wrong
description:
"Gong" is a universal cognate (same word in virtually every language), and an onomatopoeia (word that sounds the same as what it describes). It's an under-appreciated instrument, and you have to hear it played the right way to truly appreciate it.

Join us for sound meditations with gongs and bowls to explore deeper states of consciousness. Reveal your deepest self in ecstatic dance or by playing one of our many drums or gongs. Catch us at our Wednesday camp party, or meet us on the playa as we share the same energy serendipitously!

name: Camp Orange
description: In 2023, Camp Orange will return to Black Rock City for our ninth consecutive year and our 10-year anniversary, and our 16-foot tall banana stand will once again tower erect over the Playa — a shining, lighted beacon for all citizens of BRC in search of a place to rest their weary, dusty bananas! Join us for chocolate covered frozen bananas, fruity frozen drinks, silly dance parties, our Muumuu Monday March, fun and educational Better Ask a Banana workshops inside our cozy dome, or just to hang out and have a good time.

name: Connect MOAR!
description:
Fostering intimacy amongst humans, one dusty foot and heart at a time. 
Connect MoAr is an international hospitality camp that specializes in the most magnificent playa foot scrub you've ever had! Special music, late night tea dome and snuggle lounge are just a few of our delicious offerings to the people of BRC, and the playa!

name: Geckos
description:
The Gecko camp has been a BRC landmark since 2007 and we are ready to rock the playa again this year! Our main bar lights up with an interactive Simon Says Games starting night fall. Our dance floor and lounge focus on deep house disco music. 

Our resident DJs (DJ-M, DJ Galexy, DJ GoSouth, SamCake, DJ Loustaou) will be rocking the Gecko's Camp this year again, every night starting at 7pm. DJ-M has been playing music for Black Rock City for over 15 years now!. DJ Galexy regularly plays in various clubs in San Francisco and at other camps in BRC…

Oh, and don't forget: on Thursday noon, we host our Playa-renowned ABCD PARTY: bring your Ass, eat some Bacon (and pizza), drink some Champagne and dance on Disco!

name: The Inflatable Zoo
description:
The Inflatable Zoo is a haven for all during their time on the Playa. It's a place where you can come and feel young again, feel like you're not in the middle of a desert and to give a splash of color to contrast the playa dust filter.

As the name suggests - The Inflatable Zoo is full of inflatables (collected from around the world) of all different types of animals. The vast majority of these have been saved from the Caribbean and Mediterranean seas, after boat holidays and their owners see them as single-use hard plastic and discard them, we have collected them and brought them home. A lot of camp members work on boats and in a perfect position to save these inflatables and repurpose them in Black Rock City.

name: Deadbeat Club
description: Home of the Deadbeat Cafe, the neighborhood coffee spot where everyone's a regular. Join us for a morning pick-me-up, stay for downtempo afternoon events, or just chill out when the Playa has you dead beat. You belong to the Deadbeat Club.

name: Pookah Lounge/SNAFUBAR/X-Pats
description: Pookah Lounge— an old-school burners' paradise, complete with fine company, xmas lights, art & music, thrills, and chills... But what makes it really cool is YOU. Drop by and be cool. SNAFUBAR—the better beverage bar—drop by and stay in school! We'll mix you the best drink on the Playa!

name: Butt Disco
description: Butt Disco is a Brooklyn-based camp that has come to the playa to make you shake your booty to organic house beats. If you like dancing, djs, laughing, getting weird, and butts as much as we do, you'll want to come and join our party. Also offering other butt stuff throughout the week. We're an ass-tastic group of individuals with one thing in common: having a good time. Hope you'll join us!

name: Spice N Vice
description: Spice N Vice offers Bedouin hospitality every day from 10am-4 p.m. Visit us for some hot or cold chai tea. Our comfortable oasis is also the perfect place to take a break from the sun and talk to one of our travel sages for stories about life abroad and travel advice.

name: Ice Ice Maybe
description: Welcome to Ice Ice Maybe, formerly known as Galapagos! We are a small but playful and inviting camp that offers daytime events inspired by wordplay, silliness, nerdiness and creative joy – hosted in a camp with some ice/winter-themed infrastructure and art. The concept is that we'll bring a solar panel array to power ice generation, and serve this ice to sweaty Burners in the form of smoothies. It's a new concept, new identity, and new setup for us. We expect it to work but it's all an experiment -- hence the "Maybe"!

name: MASSochists
description: The MASSochists are just what the playa was looking for, a Boston pun-themed kink camp with a T train bar, an education area and Boston themed dungeon space. Our goal is to provided educational classes, run a safe, clean, well monitored dungeon space and a separate social bar.

name: Whores Smores
description: Our gifts to BRC are special whoreish SMores by night, and personal growth by day. Visit us before dark for intuitive readings or our Women's Circle. By night (most nights), as you may guess, we serve yummy SMores – with toasted marshmallows as you like it on our Whores roaster.
