We strive to facilitate rewarding connections that will leave you feeling uplifted and energized. Join us for a truly unforgettable experience.

name: Hanging Gardens of BRC
description: Welcome to the Hanging Gardens of BRC! Since 2015, we've offered a restorative, lush hang-out space that's open 24/7 for dusty wanderers to come hang, connect, and cool off.  Every morning, we greet the day with fresh, handmade fruit smoothies and pancakes. Whether you're coming in from sunrise or just starting your day, come replenish your body and share a refreshing moment with your neighbors. And of course, our favorite event happens to be our Annual Garden Party complete with a hosted bar & DJ happening early Tuesday evening. We can't wait to see you!

name: Lady Gaia Camp
description:
Bringing the Moroccan desert to Black rock city.
Moroccan Berber desert tent to showcase a real way of desert living, the blue trin=bes in Morocco are not a show but a real way of living in the desert and that is what i am bringing to the playa this year. a real way of living in the desert.

name: Imperfection at Priscilla
description:
Priscilla, Queen of the Doof travels the path of Imperfection in 2023, addressing radical self-expression and how to unleash your imperfect with Imperfection @ Priscilla. We're still the camp that you know and love, with Dildo Olympics cuming back for its 5th year on playa, our usual tear-the-house-down inclusive parties (approached imperfectly) and with some new additions to our interactivity schedule! 

Come for a refreshing dose of 'Who Gives A F*ck' and stay for the bloody good company.

xoxo - Priscilla & the gang

name: Wild Horses support camp
description: Art Support camp for "Wings of Glory - The Return", and for "The Spirit of the Healing Siren"

name: Pappy's Master Bait Shoppe
description: Here ye here ye come one come all ;) to the master bate shop. Join the ranks of hopeful master baiters as we bait and troll the Burning Man waters in reel time.

name: Camp By Chance
description:
Your cozy new home away from home full of
friendly faces, helpful hands and kind creatures.  We host the infamous Burning Mouth Hot Sauce Bar featuring sauces from mild to spicy HOT. Homegrown Scary Margarita, Latte Muerte, Bourbon Ghost, Papaya Habanero and the Reaper are offered. Residents are free to venture as far up the heat ladder as they dare. All the while grooving to funky classic tunes for a spicy dance party in your mouth and in the street.  Tears of heated joy are common. If visitors are looking for a less spicy, more relaxed vibe, they can come find their zen at a guided art meditation. Stop by to find your spicy zen!

name: GDI - Gawd Damn Independents
description: We're the Gawd Damn Independents - and we're workin' for the Man - perhaps you are too. Stop by and say hello after your long dusty day; if your bike needs a bit of TLC - we'll try to MacGyver something for you. If it's hot - we'll crack a cold drink and you can tell us a story about your work under our shade - while you share your best -  "there was this one time at Burning Man..." story.

name: Camp Cuddlingus
description: We at Camp Cuddlingus bring the Manbassador and other art to the community.

name: BlinkingManCamp97
description: BlinkingManCamp97 returns! Stop by for a wacky IQ TEST (everyone passes) or get an interrogation by iconic Joe Friday. We ALWAYS have unique swag. After the fun head out to the Trash Fence and visit our ZOOZ - 70 animals inside tennis rackets, project 12 out there by our camp. DRAGNET, it's not just for breakfast any more.

name: Burning Man Earth
description: Burning Man Earth / iBurn app is a geo data project started by Larry Harvey and Rod Garrett in 2005 to provide digital mapping and navigation solutions. Although dedicated to BRC it can easily me adapted for solutions for refugee camps or disaster situations.

name: Kosmic Korner
description:
Come join us and experience a haven of tranquility. 

Unleash your creativity with paint and canvas, or simply relax in the shade with the gentle breeze of fans and misters while indulging in snacks, water, and tea to keep yourself energized for the rest of the day. 

Our camp is equipped with musical instruments like a rain stick, didgeridoo, and bongos, perfect for impromptu jamming sessions that soothe the soul. 

As night falls, prepare to be mesmerized by a captivating light show that transforms Kosmic Korner into an otherworldly realm, or find yourself a comfortable spot in the Zen Den and let the peaceful ambiance of the Zen Den lull you into a restful night's sleep

name: Kidsville
description: The village for kids and their families at Burning Man! If you have kids and want to meet other young burners, this is the place. Come by and use our trampolines, our play structures, come and get snow cones, and meet other families for playa adventures.

name: Penny Smashing Point
description:
Welcome to Penny Smashing Point which provides you with an elongated collectible coin dated every year since 2014!
This is also a place where you can get you beautiful body painted by a Skin Wars Second Season winner Lana Chromium.

name: Rancho Sparkle Pony
description: Rancho Sparkle Pony, your home away from home away from home, while you are home. Come belly up to The Rubber Spur for hilarious drinks and strong characters, or get vain and prance on the Mane Stage to the tunes coming from the Buddha Lounge. Take a flow class, or learn to blow glass. Just don't blow ass on our property, save that for the Portos.

name: Jenniversary
description: A group of burner besties celebrating our friend Jen's 10th burn in a row!

name: Opulent Chill
description: Opulent Chill, a sanctuary for chill music, shade, connection and conversation.

name: The Shangri-Lounge
description: A bicycle-drawn martini bar, serving the finest cocktails in Deep Playa. The Lounge sets up in a different hidden spot each night after midnight. If you can find us, you will be rewarded with a magical experience in our upscale neon lounge. Relax, enjoy the stars, and engage in intimate conversation with new friends, over the soothing sounds of Sinatra.

name: Polaris
description: An international, illuminating, and intergalactic camp, Polaris serves as a shining symbol of radical wayfinding. Steadfast in our statement to love and care for one another, we offer a beacon of starlight for travelers!

name: Mah Na Mah Na
description: LED Crown Workshop - Look gorgeous and make it easier for your friends to find you at night.

name: Camp NeverLeave
description: Come and enjoy a cooling zone during the daytime and a warm and cozy fireplace in the evening.  Ice sculpture, art work, fashion show, fire performers, dance floor and music by DJs from around the world!

name: Decadance
description: Decadance is a community trumpeting the power of being YOU TO THE MAX. Join us for the Decadance Dinner Club. It's time to dance the dance only you can dance #onlyyou

name: Golden Chai
description: Find us in The Golden Guy Alley - East for your fresh serving of well-balanced Chai.  Bring your own cup.

name: Retire-Bees
description: Our camp will be offering a rooftop deck atop the Bombus Regius Steampunk Airship Art Car ( docked for the summer ) stationed Esplanade within The Hive Village. Our upper deck event space will host a variety of events such as Karaoke, Dark and Stormy Story telling events, Tabletop and RPG daytime. The lower deck features a Tiki Bar plus some Fancy Festive and Fun pedal powered Rickshaws that will ferry guests from camp to the playa for adventures and Tiki Light Totems.

name: Atlantis
description:
Don't call us a sound camp. We are a dance camp. 
Sunsets/Sunrise dj's, drinks, and dancing.

name: Camp Axolotl
description: Camp Axolotl is nestled in La Calaca Village come say hi, friends!

name: Heavy Petting Zoo
description: Heavy Petting Zoo's main purpose is to create commUnity while providing spontaneous opportunities for fun and inclusion for all species of party animals.

name: Rabble Rousers
description:
Welcome to the Rabble Rousers camp, home of the Shenanigan Wagon ! Our art car is the ultimate mode of transportation for anyone who wants to experience the playa in style. Join us for unforgettable art tours that will take you on a journey through some of the most stunning and innovative art installations at Burning Man. 

But thats not all, our camp is also known for its delicious Jerky and soft served ice cream served fresh off the wagon. Whether youre looking for a sweet treat or savory snack weve got you covered.

name: TeddyBot
description: TeddyBot 2.0

name: Base Camp
description: Home of the Metro Chop mutant vehicle

name: Camp Florida Man
description: Bringing florida to the burn

name: The firehouse
description: The Firehouse bar at Do More Now is the best little hangout in the neighborhood.  We have parties, events, workshops, and performances happening every day. Come and introduce yourself!

name: Temple of Floating Compression
description: We are the art support camp for The Temple of Floating Compression, a tensegrity sculpture made of a dozen wooden beams that do not touch each other, but are instead held apart by stainless steel cables.  In the center, suspended, is a ten foot diameter tensegrity icosahedron.

name: The Cuddlepillar
description: The Cuddlepillar Mutant Vehicle support camp.

name: From Mars With Love
description: Home of our mutant vehicle, the Serendipity Mars Rover

name: The Unchanged Future
description: The Unchanged Future Camp is an art support camp. We support the assembly and disassembly of our art piece and to ensure that our art is operational and safe throughout the duration of Burning Man. We are an all inclusive camp with the aim of bringing burners together to awaken and to collaborate in making our planet safe for all generations to come. We are passionate about sustainability and stopping climate collapse.

name: Blazing Death Ship
description:
Beware, weary travelers, the siren call of our dark corner of the playa: a haven for those who seek refuge from the cacophony of Burning Man. Enter the realm of the Death Ship, a shuttle to another dimension where time and space fold upon themselves. The air is thick with the scent of exotic librarians and the sounds of distorted steel, beckoning you to join us in our cosmic journey. Explore our mysterious corners, where strange and otherworldly creatures mingle with the mortals.
Beware, for the Death Ship is not for the faint of heart. Only those who dare to venture into our lair will find the ultimate reward: two room-temperature beef tacos... or an agonizing trip to the frozen underworld!

name: Adopt the Bead
description:
If you ever wonder how all these glass beads are created stop by in Adopt A Bead camp! See the magic, adopt one for yourself so it will remind you about this time on Playa.
You also might want to check our exclusive collection of scarves!

name: Golden Gate Project
description: Look for the Golden Gate Bridge

name: Firefly Solar
description: The genesis for our camp began last year when we decided to bring solar energy to BRC. This year, we are expanding to offer tours of Firefly Solar 2.0, a 53kW solar system with 112 kWh battery storage. We also plan to host a panel discussion on sustainability & renewable energy for the Burning Man community. Have an interest in solar? Come check us out!

name: Hivemind
description: Support Camp for the art piece, Flutter. Stop by for a chat about art or to meet Billy Bones the skeleton.

name: Recycle Camp
description:
Recycle Camp is located at the intersection of Center Camp Inner Circle and 6:00. We accept aluminum cans only, between 9:00am and 5:00pm, Monday through Sunday of the event week. We want all your aluminum cans. Spread the word!

Want to volunteer? Recycle Camp invites everyone to join in the fun. Take charge at your camp and separate all your recycling and put the aluminum cans in a mesh bag to dry out. Bring your aluminum cans to Recycle Camp and crush them with the State ­of ­the ­Art bike powered can crusher.

name: Church of Crust
description: Spreading the gouda word of grilled cheese sandwiches. Come by during our Passion of the Crust events for a slice of grilled cheese served by Grilled Cheesus and his apostles. Cheese be with you!

name: Hydration Station
description: Hydration Station Camp will be serving Jägermeister/Underground Bombs (with 3oz of Monster Zero) daily from 1pm - 3pm, Sunday - Friday and Saturday 11am - 1:00pm along with water and Gatorade available 24/7.

name: Vanishing Points
description: Vanishing Point Art Support Camp provides a welcoming and engaging environment for our diverse team of artists and builders, who are responsible for the creation and maintenance of the Vanishing Points installation. This immersive and interactive art piece encourages exploration, connection, and reflection, fostering an inclusive space that embraces the diversity of the Black Rock City community. Our camp members are committed to advancing Radical Inclusion, Diversity, and Equity (R.I.D.E.) values through our art and actions. If you know us or want to meet us, feel free to stop by our camp and say hello!

88
12+ year DC based camp with Denizens from all over the world. We gift, we groove, we work, we chill. We eat, we cavort, we explore, we connect.

name: PolyParadise
description:
The Village of PolyParadise has been influencing the Hearts & Minds and Washing the Bodies of Playa Citizens from '2:00 - 10:00' since 1999 celebrating 25 years in BRC in 2023. 

Polyamory involves openness to multiple loving relationships, with honesty among all partners. We welcome ALL Poly & Poly Friendly folks to camp within our borders. 

The Village of PolyParadise 2023 welcomes the addition of two Theme Camps within its borders | Twisted Swan | Temple of Bacchus. 

PolyParadise is NOT a Swinger Camp. Being Poly or Practicing Poly is NOT a requirement for camping with us, but being OPEN MINDED about other people's lifestyle choices IS!!

name: Dirty Goat Roadhouse
description: Home of the Dirty Goat Roadhouse mutant vehicle

name: BRC Cosmic Comedy Club (BRCCCC)
description: The BRCCCC (We look forward to adding more C's) is the Black Rock City Cosmic Comedy Club. We want to bring you into the wonderful world of Stand Up Comedy, come by early and learn how to be on stage, come by late and watch the professionals do it. You never know what you might see!

name: Iguana Chill
description:
Welcome to Chill! Iguana Chill is known for its chill vibes, chill music, chill spaces, and chill people. Our primary offering is a stage for live music, comedy shows, open mics, drum circles, and DJs.

Our chill space consists of a carpeted and pillowed wigwam that swallows you as you chill. Our drinks are chilled. Our people are chill. Our beats are chill. Now we wanna chill. You wanna chill. Iguana Chill.

name: Yaass Daddy!
description: Seattle WA – We are primarily an art support camp for BAJ (Butt Activated Jellyfish) but also participate in pop-up activities around the playa (Golden Guy bar hosting, fresh midnight cookie sharing and sunrise breakfast gatherings). We are always welcoming to camp visitors. If you like, you'll get to sit in Daddy's lap and share your stories.

name: After Hoot
description: It's a hoot

name: SpiritWild
description:
SpiritWild is a healing experiential performance that creates a portal space to help you channel your Animalia. Inspired by the elements of nature, you’ll meet a host of characters that embody the spirits of the natural world. 

We offer a magical space to interact, play, relax, chill, and be entertained. We have a variety of daytime wellness offerings: breathwork, meditation, and yoga. Explore native folk dance movement. Learn to dance the Bachata or the partner NewStyle Hustle. 

Music from DJs and live musicians, storytelling, rituals, and performances. Relax for a moment of gratitude in a cozy immersive altar experience, join an open dialogue featuring voices not often heard, and more! 

We’re all about connecting, getting inspired, and creating magic together. PoC led!

name: Infinity
description: We're the host of the Black Rock City Art Exchange post card project and the fabulous 50's Housewife Party.  We also provide a cozy Cuddle Puddle and Marley's roadside bar for your enjoyment.

name: Moonwalk Mission
description: Moonwalk Mission Come take off with us

name: The Last Starfighters
description: Greetings, Starfighter. You have been recruited by the Star League to defend the playa against commodification & moop. Your participation in supporting artists by building a branch of The Solar Library & giving home to Solarians is to be commended. Your communal effort & civic responsibility will be known across the galaxy. You as a radically self reliant creature have always wanted to fight a desperate battle against incredibly dusty odds. The Trailing Soul & Augmented Reality Porta Potties are your legacy. Remember to listen next time a gung-ho iguana tells you to relax.

name: MOSP(Ministry of Special Permits)
description: If you need a permit for that special thing, and you cannot find the right department at BMO, come see us.  Or if you want some water, a hug, a place to put your feet up, or just a good story come on by...permit not required.

name: The Misfits Garage
description:
The Misfits Garage is a community of People from the Global Majority who are committed to R.I.D.E. Our camp members are chosen because of their diversity and desired skills in designing, building, bringing and performing on Mutant Vehicles. We are also a LGBTQ+ camp and strive to create a welcoming space free from oppression and discrimination while encouraging everyone to be their authentic selves.

We are bringing together the incredible knowledge of more than half a dozen Black artists to research, inform and build the vehicle. Added to this group are builders from marginalized groups. As we all work together to realize a single goal, we understand that our focus is on creating a space for Black Burners and other People of the Global Majority to feel seen and heard.

name: Pablos Crusty Creatives
description: Inclusive art support camp.  Always looking for wayward, collaborative arts.

name: WrongoWrongo
description: The home of the mutant vehicle Uuna Ahi and your somewhat friendly neighborhood mutant vehicle repair oasis.

name: Anonymous
description: Anonymous offers sober camping and support for burners in recovery from drugs, alcohol and process addictions.  We support the mission of Anonymous Village in providing recovery resources, leading meetings, and fellowship/hospitality to all of Black Rock City.

name: Space Paladin
description: We Bring Art

name: Mystical Order of Dust andShadows
description: Help us discover esoteric knowledge by solving a series of puzzles and mysteries sacred to our order.

name: Solo Solos camp
description: Our camp is for Motohiko Kamimura's artwork and Takeshi Furuki's performance.

name: Black Rock Adventures Bus!
description:
Providing accessible Playa tours in our adventure rig, with room for about 10 - 16 Burners, leaving from our BUS STOP! art installation on the Playa. Tours go daily at 9am, return you to the BUS STOP! and last about 2hrs. Contact us for info about special tours and pick ups/drop offs. http://www.blackrockadventures.org for more!

To find our camp - look for tall Grey Feather Flags with a big " ! "on them!

name: Sound Cabin
description: Sound Cabin Mutant Vehicle Support Camp

name: A Transformation Station Camp
description: The art and interactivity heart of transformation

name: The Wise Owl
description: Speakeasy within Golden Guy East

name: Cold Yogis
description:
The Cold Yogis offers workshops for breathwork, cold exposures,  brain over body techniques, rocket yoga and animal flow to increase health, self control, and consciousness. We are a small international camp that shares space in Contact Collective along with Camp Contact,  DECENTRAL and others
We are also bringing the Charming Chill Chariot mutant vehicle to the Playa.

name: Slow Burn Lounge,aka Fandango Bar
description: 28 years ago people were dumb and came out to party. Now we are a big ole village with members spread all over. Nothing has changed, and everything has changed. These are our people. We are our people. Welcome to Fandango. Be sure to say hello when you stop by for a beer!

name: Black Rock Labs The Expanse
description: Black Rock Labs The Expanse is the home camp for Black Rock Labs, a sustainability innovation affiliate of the Burning Man Project.

name: Camp High Maintenance
description:
Camp High Maintenance is the supporter of the Bioluminescent Slug mutant vehicle. 
We happily provide trips around the playa, Art Tours and hope to be part of BAIT this year.

name: Electric Giraffe Safari Park IV
description: Russell the Electric Giraffe is back!  Look for us in the camp listings as Electric Giraffe Safari Park! Please come by and hang out with us!  We're mostly available from the hours of 3pm to 3am!  =:)

name: The Alpaca Pakka Family
description:
The Alpaca Pakka Family!
Art support camp that likes to meet new people. If you see us in camp, stop by and say hi, dance with us, eat some food. We would love to know what you're all about!

name: Camp Local - Airport
description: Black Rock Municipal Airport Work Camp

name: Camp Fly
description: Home of the dragonfly swarm art cars and pickleball.

name: Chromania
description:
"The People's Republic of Chromania"

Art support camp of the Chromaforms Art Collective; Presenting: "Touch the Sky"

Look out for the Rainbow Comet in the sky! (Our glowing camp totem mounted high on a pole)

name: Counter Culture
description: We are the BRC Census support camp. Drop by anytime to learn about what Census does and the information we have to share. We'll have data and games all week. Friday afternoon we'll be celebrating the release of 2023 Census Random Sampling with drinks and data.

name: B.E.D Bureau of Erotic Discourse
description: We are a team of volunteers who to provide information and education regarding the 11th principle of Burning Man: Consent. Our mission is to promote consent culture on the playa! Our goal is to empower every theme camp to create a safe and consensual environment for their participants. With the help of our Beducators, we can work together to make Burning Man a truly inclusive and respectful experience for everyone. Visit our website to become a Beducator today! https://bureauoferoticdiscourse.net

name: Camp Connection
description: We will have a 7'5" LED ring as a portal to our camp.

name: Temple Guardians
description:
Temple Guardians' main duty is to hold the space of the Temple, to ensure an inviting, inclusive environment that allows everyone to experience what they seek without interference. We do so by unobtrusively protecting the peacefulness and safety of both the structure and the participants who visit it

Learn more about what we do and how we do it at: https://templeguardians.burningman.org/wp-content/uploads/Temple-Guardians-Manual-2023-v2.pdf

name: Nyurmok
description: This is the homebase camp for the Nyurmok Playa Art Installation, and for any other crazy wandering artists just passing through

name: BlockHaus
description: The support camp for BlockHaus the mobile spa

name: Mooner Landing
description: A landing pad for Moonbuggy, the rising crescent moon that glows as bright as the celestial orb in the sky.  Get lunar inside the moon, cosmonaut the day away in a space helmet, and defy gravity on the trampoline.

name: Kam Krü Kool Kamp
description: Kam Kru Kool Kamp will host a Performance Stage on the famous Narwhal overnight through Friday night.  Participants will be able to sing, dance or perform spoken word every night.

name: Big Tuna Blues
description:
Our camp will have a black and white RV. 
Our Mutant Vehicle will be showing a video of an aquarium even as it is parked at our camp site.

name: Flirt Camp
description: Flirting is, at it's core, the ability to fully notice and enjoy interactions you have with others.  AND, It's our final year on the playa as Flirt Camp!!  We welcome everyone to enjoy our chill lounge, and invite any who would like to tell tales of interacting with us over the decade, or just share your most insane Burning Man stories with us. We look forward to flirting with you! :)

name: Hush Hush Pony Barn
description: The home stable for our mutant art car, hosting a delta-style jazz house inside, with a bumping party on top.  We offer a good view when not roaming the playa.

name: Museum of No Spectators Support
description: Museum of No Spectators Support Camp

name: Camp Beagle Scouts
description: Camp Beagle Scouts - Visit us to be sure and get your Lucy inspired psychiatric advice or will it be add-vice Black Rocky City style, it might be good, funny, and completely unnecessary we won't even charge 5 cents.

name: Buffalo Quarters
description: New Orleans-based Wild-West-themed art support camp for the Burden of the Beast (BoB) sculpture.

name: Pariah Express Camp
description: Pariah Express Camp supporting the Pariah Express Mutant Vehicle.  We are all outcasts

name: Arbitrarium
description:
We build this mutant vehicle on playa every year to share a reminder that you should never lose the child like wonder and imagination, that nothing is that serious. "it's all performance Art!" _Bill Gilman (Original SOS designer) You can't take a Giant furry yellow submarine sauntering across the playa with rainbow flowers lights and a crew that's wearing matching yellow rain gear bibs in the middle of the desert seriously.
We will continue to provide support& transportation for the Seattle Fire Conclave, and adventures for wondering travelers including BAIT

name: Camp BORING
description: Camp BORING: art support for BORING sign. Promoters of sarcasm and shenanigans. Come by for a sticker and a sunset sign push!

name: HUGGZILLA Art Car Support Camp
description: HUGGZILLA Art Car Support Camp where Hugs are not scary

name: Famous In Japan
description: At "Barbie's Closet" we're here to help you level up your Playa outfit. We offer 24 hour access to our closet of clothes, which is updated twice a day with new clothing. Our skilled campers in sewing and clothing design will be available to help you fix, repair, and alter your Playa wear during our scheduled clinics.

name: Playa Jack Rabbits Dusty Hole Bar
description:
Playa Jackrabbits Dusty Hole Saloon is here to wet your dusty whistle while out roaming the BRC backstreets.  
Stop in and play  our roulette wheel or sit for a game of cards and enjoy our shaded saloon but watch out for the jackrabbits.  
Our Camp Jackrabbits are from NYC, San Diego, Ashland, Nevada City, Vashon and Seattle based.

name: Burners Without Borders
description: BWB promotes activities around the globe that support a community's inherent capacity to thrive by encouraging innovative approaches to disaster relief and grassroots initiatives that make a positive impact.

name: One-Eyed Monster Art Car Camp
description: The One-Eyed Monster Art Car is home to the Puzzle Quest Camp and Sgt Pepper's Pendants Lectures and Display.  Stop by to learn about pendant designing and manufacturing.  Or if you want a challenge, participate in the Puzzle Quest!

name: Media Mecca
description: Media Mecca is Black Rock City's home to storytellers, journalists, and media. All media projects must register at Mecca prior to beginning in BRC.

name: Ballistic Bubbles
description: Ballistic Bubbles, mutant army tank that blows bubbles not bombs.

name: Andas
description: ANDAS - Art support camp for the glowing turtle

name: Divine Feminine
description: Divine Feminine is an art creation and support camp.  The camp has doctors, lawyers, fabrication/welding experts and world travelers.

name: F.U.Ego Stage Bar & Lounge
description:
Camp Fuego hosts the F.U.EGO Bar, No Mercy Stage & Backstage A/C Lounge, serving daily the playa's only ORGANIC SNOW CONES and hosting No Mercy karaoke parties, an open mic, and DJ'd dance parties. DJs and musicians welcomed to our stage! Choose any mixed drink, mocktail, spiked cone, cold craft beer or hard cider. No Mercy karaoke singers agree to be cut off at any time, for any reason, or no reason at all! A gong is standing by. Only truly amazing singers get to the end of a song. ALL PARTICIPANTS, gonged or not, gain access to Fuego's Backstage A/C Lounge! There you will sip top shelf booze in cool luxury. 
Look for Camp Fuego's namesake Art Installation, "Fuego", a life-sized stretched barbed-wire prancing HORSE with flame effects coming from her eyes and mane. And Eff Your Ego!

name: Camp PtP - The Clock Ship Tere
description: Art Support Camp for "Queen Cobra", by artist Andrea Greenlees. Also the home port and support camp for The Clock Ship Tere and her crew.

name: Bubblegasm
description: Bubblegasm is a mutant vehicle built to spread the joy of bubbles and lights with all those who ride on her or dance and play around her. Bubbles are a metaphor for life, fleeting and fragile and are a reminder about how precious our time is while we are here, and to make the most of each moment. And like each bubble, each person and their life is beautiful and unique. Bubbles are also temporary and once they pop they become part of the universe, just as we do when we die. When people encounter bubbles it is a like a rare moment of magic. They symbolize our childhood innocence, reminding us of a time when life was simple and carefree. When we see these glass-like orbs dancing in the air they remind us to live in the moment, let go, dance with a stranger, be silly - have a bubblegasm!

name: Abraxas
description: Abraxas welcomes the strange friends and the friendly strangers always and all ways.

name: Chatterbox
description: Chatterbox is excited to be part of Cosmiquarium, we will be cruising the Playa sending smiles across the miles!

name: Bat Haus
description:
Art support camp for Duck Around and Find Out.

Come on by and take your photo in one of our face in a hole photo ops- we will have a couple of popular past designs as well as a new art board for this years theme of Animalia.

name: Butterfly Heart Tribe
description: Butterfly Heart Tribe:  Art support camp for the art piece entitled, Breaking Open.

name: Camp Babe
description: CAMP BABE is an Art Support Camp bringing "Daytrip Lullaby" to the playa this year.  It is an interactive musical experience that will blow your mind! Come check it out and make some music with us!

name: Camp Nebula
description: Art support camp for a new on playa art piece. Visit us at camp or on playa!

name: Tiki Bars and Tool Belts
description: Tiki Bars and Tool Belts is the support camp for the Funkadelephant Mutant Vehicle. We're brought together by our love of building things, and taking those things both very seriously, and also very leisurely. Come by to visit An Abundance of Caution, or come find the Funkadelephant wandering the Playa. Aloha!

name: Bmir
description: BMIR 94.5 FM, The Voice Of The Man

name: Joya Camp
description: A group of artists, craft-men and friends working together, spreading the feeling of "Pasarla Joya" (having a great time). Gather around our beloved art structure, Joya in Deep Playa.

name: Expanse
description: Expanse is an art support camp for the Expanse art piece.

name: Mutant Wranglers
description: We are a Mutant Vehicle Support Camp that invites you to visit! See our artwork! Hang with Romanians! Drink some Palinka!

name: Pinky Swears
description: If you like giant rainbows, giant flamingos, giant ice cream cones, or giant upside down trees you're going to love Pinky Swears!

name: Lost Wages
description: Camp Here - Home to the El Loco Loco mutant vehicle.

name: In Dust We Trust
description:
IDWT is happy to celebrate our 20th year on playa! Our MV "The Dusty Busty" is back for more Art Tours, Burlesque Shows and shenanigans.
Stop by our feral Lingerie Boutique and score something sexy for your sexy self!
Snow cones every day during the hottest ours!
"Official" Burner cards for all you fake burners!

name: Air BRC
description: AIR BRC

name: The Interkozmos
description:
In this bizarre realm, extraordinary audio spring forth from the shifting dust, entrancing your senses and bending reality. A hypnotic dance of laser lights, reminiscent of some twisted imagination, paints the night with the Interkozmos hues.

Wander deeper into our camp and stumble upon something that is hiding waiting for you to find. Maybe you'll hear it or maybe you'll hear about it.

name: Intergalactic Confederation
description: We invite all intergalactic beings to come and enjoy some outer space techno music with the ORBIT crew, Tuesday and Thursday before sunset.

name: Playa Info/VRT
description: Providing Oracles, Digital Services, Lost and Found, ASL, Health Permits and BRC Lockout and Towing Services. Open 9am-6pm

name: House of Sammich
description: We serve gourmet, gluten-free, cinnamon-buttered toasted, peanut-butter and jelly sammiches. All that we ask is for you to provide us with a taste of YOUR flavor. Sing us a song..., tell us a joke..., confess a sin.., the dirtier the better. We also provide a moving cuddle puddle which is all about conscious conversations: opening up, connecting, and sharing what's going on inside oneself.

name: Playa Paul's Concierge Service
description: Playa Paul's Concierge Service is the top provider of exclusive VIP services in Black Rock City. Nobody else sets up the deserving in the level of luxury to which they have become accustomed. Visit us for gourmet coffee, specialty cocktails, and magnificent prizes.

name: Fern
description: Rampart Staff camping, open Rampart staff.

name: ESD Station 3:00
description: ESD Station 3 Fire Camp

name: The Octagon
description: art support group for Playa art work "The Octagon"

name: Illumina Radiata Art Support Camp
description: Art support camp encouraging radical participation, inclusion, diversity and community support.

name: Rustic WERQ Ranch & Cuntry Club
description: Where ASS unwinds.

name: Galactic Snake Farm
description: Support camp for the mutant vehicle Abduction. Home to the intergalactically acclaimed Galactic Snake Farm!

name: The Pit
description: camping for dmv volunteers

name: Luna Land
description: We are the launch site, mission control and earth-side home for Luna The Artcrane. As a team we embody the values of community, inclusivity, creativity, and feminine energy. The art car serves as a platform for people to collaborate and express themselves creatively. Luna The Artcrane is committed to spreading joy, expression, inspiration, and the spirit of community.

name: Disco Circus
description: Come one, come all. Relax in the shade, take a ride on The Galactic Terrapin or dance the night away under the disco lights. The Galactic Terrapin departs nightly, 1 hour before sunset.

name: Moober Goobers
description: The support camp for a mutant vehicle called Moober The People Moover. Its kinda like Uber, but it's just a giant Cow. We only accept payment in smiles, stories or jokes so come on by for a spin 'round the playa.

name: Clock Suckers
description: We love big old dusty clocks!  We are an art support camp for the Burning Time art project.

name: ESD Station 9:00
description: ESD Station 9, Medical Camp

name: ESD Rampart
description: Rampart medical clinic, 5;15 and Esplanade look for the Red Cross sign

name: The whipping waffle
description: A place for yum in your tum and fun for your bum.

name: The Burbs
description: The Burbs is the home for ESD staff, friends and Family. It is also the location of the Vendor for Burning Mans fire suppression.

name: Ouroboros
description: Our Crew, composed of Designers, Engineers, Victorian Restoration Specialists, Scientists and Artists will lead hour long discussions with titles Such as "Ask and Engineer" that are set daily at 3pm followed by Tea or Libations at 4pm that culminate  in a tour of the Decks of the SQ with a Q&A with the Ship's Chief Engineer Topics such as the SQ Anti-Mater Space Time Propulsion System, Navigation System will be discussed. Captain Langhorne may be on hand to field Questions about the old boiler unit, and spin yarns of keel hauling shenanigans of the SQ's Glory Days.

name: HOVerlandia
description: Designated camping for riders of the Burner Express. All riders are welcomed to camp across the street from the bus depot in HOVerlandia. Share your love for mass transit with Burners from all over the world.

name: Playful Again!
description:
Art Predator's Playhouse is an Art Support Camp for Valerie Mallory's 2023 project, Playful Again! a large-scale art installation that's an invitation to reconnect to the childlike joy and wonder that comes from the pure act of play. As children we explore our lives through the whimsical and romantic world of play. This is central to our ability to use our hands, interact with, and learn to live in the world. 

Life is magical when we are at play and we can create; we find solace in stories that had the power to magically transport. To play is at the core of being human. It's a form of Radical Self-Expression. Playful Again is an invitation to reclaim our birthright of joy. Learn more: https://playfulagain.org

name: Rise Sanctuaria
description: Rise Sanctuaria is the joint camp and playa home for Drone Stories and Sanctuaria artists, creators and innovators whose mission is to create regenerative art that is good for planet earth and its inhabitants.

name: Gardeners of Missed Connections
description: The Gardeners of Missed Connections are committed to building art that celebrates human relationships.

name: Zendo 3:00
description:
The Zendo Project - Psychedelic Peer Support

Location: 3 and 9 between C and D, next to Medical and Rangers

Feeling overwhelmed? Need someone to talk to? The Zendo Project is here for you! We provide a safe, non-judgmental environment for anyone in need of emotional and psychological support. Whether you are having a challenging psychedelic trip, dealing with grief, or just need a place to regroup – our trained volunteers are here to help. We provide culturally attuned support to all persons—regardless of race, gender, or sexual orientation. The Zendo has two locations at 3:00 & C and 9:00 & C, which are open 24/7 throughout the event.

name: Zendo 9:00
description:
The Zendo Project - Psychedelic Peer Support

Location: 3 and 9 between C and D, next to Medical and Rangers

Feeling overwhelmed? Need someone to talk to? The Zendo Project is here for you! We provide a safe, non-judgmental environment for anyone in need of emotional and psychological support. Whether you are having a challenging psychedelic trip, dealing with grief, or just need a place to regroup – our trained volunteers are here to help. We provide culturally attuned support to all persons—regardless of race, gender, or sexual orientation. The Zendo has two locations at 3:00 & C and 9:00 & C, which are open 24/7 throughout the event.

name: Rainbow Pyramids Kamp
description: Rainbow Pyramid Portal

name: Joey Glowy Bar
description: Work Camp

name: Dusty Minds
description: Dusty Minds Imagination Collective

name: Cobra Shark
description: Camp Cobra Shark

name: Volunteer Village
description: Volunteer Village - Working the V-Spot.

name: V-Spot
description:
Please update the website: 
The Volunteer Resource Team run V-Spot station at Center Camp next to Playa Info.  They keep track of all the volunteer opportunities that need to be filled throughout the event. You can stop by any of the V-Spots to find something to do.

name: Earth Guardians
description: Earth Guardians are an outreach and communications volunteer group whose mission is to educate and inspire Burning Man participants to Leave No Trace (LNT) at the event. By focusing the community's tremendous artistic, technical and spiritual energy, we can go beyond leaving "no trace" and leave instead, positive traces on the land. Come see our many bike nature and geology tours, sustainability BRC and planet solution speakers, DIY workshops, Aztec Burner dances, or volunteer training and gatherings! Come and volunteer on our LNT and compliance outreach teams or participate in a Gerlach LNT our hot-spring patrol, jump on our MOOP train and test your MOOP grabbing skills!

name: Naacb
description:
NAACB (National Association for the Advancement of Colored Burners) 

Our mission is to inform people of various ethnic backgrounds, mostly African Americans, about the burning man principles and culture. We invite them out and take them as our guest with us to burner events in New York, Washington DC, and Miami.

name: TheCloud Camp
description: Basecamp for theCloudCar

name: the black hole
description: The Black Hole is the Home of Black Rock City's Gate, Perimeter and Exodus Department, and while we realize it isn't for everybody, it may VERY MUCH be for you. It was for us. If you are down to clown in all black clothes in the middle of the desert in a cloud of dust and car exhaust two miles outside of the best party on earth - then boy howdy have we got an offer for you.

name: Spanky's Wine Bar
description: Spanky's Wine Bar... the infamous crown-jewel of Burning Man bars. We take a tongue-in-cheek approach to wine, and a paddle-to-cheek approach to your butt ;)

name: Laka'lelup
description: LAKA'LELUP | Coming Together for a Common Purpose | Honoraria Art Support Camp

name: Lost + Found
description: We are a family and community, a California-based collective of dreamers, artists, adventurers, and passionate doers, that loves throwing fun badass parties as much as we love connecting on deeper levels. We are professionals at being, playing, curating unique experiences, and faffing about - whether it's flow, dance, music, magic, bubbles, movement, fire spinning, food, drinks, art, live jams, deep talks, tiny things or a whole lot of silly nonsense. We're a diverse group of eclectic individuals that operates with love and respect for the 10 Principles of Burning Man. We create interactive and magical experiences together as we inspire others to flow, love, and be their free and fearless selves. We also take lost and found items, including people. ;) Come play and get lost with us. )'(

name: Rainbow Geometric
description: Rainbow Geometric is the art support camp for Wizard's 2023 playa sculpture project OHM a 10 ring torus that spins around.  Be careful on it!   Wizard will also  have a fun light torus to run around inside of at the front of camp!

name: Lamplighters Chapel
description:
The Lamplighters are more than a handful of volunteers; they are a team of well over 100 participants every evening of the festival. And the dozen or so lanterns from 1993 have grown to nearly 1000. To accomplish this considerable task, we ask for your help, and we invite you to be a part of this community, this event, and our tradition. Before the event closes, after The Man burns, more than 1000 people will have helped the Lamplighters accomplish their important work.

The Lamplighters begin EVERY EVENING of the event in their center camp workspace at around 5pm. The ceremony begins around 6, and soon the work is done. No experience is required. We welcome virgin and seasoned burners alike. One thing is certain though. We can't do it without YOU.

name: Lamplighter Village/Lounge
description:
The Lamplighters began in 1993, with a small group of participants placing a dozen or so kerosene lanterns on the ground each evening, illuminating a pathway towards The Man. In the intervening years, Black Rock City has grown, and while many things have changed, the Lamplighters remain, though few at the time could have imagined how the Lamplighters would develop, and rise to the challenge of an expanding city.

To accomplish this considerable task, we ask for your help, and we invite you to be a part of this community, this event, and our tradition.

The Lamplighters begin EVERY EVENING of the event in their center camp workspace at 5pm. No experience is required. We welcome virgin and seasoned burners alike. One thing is certain though. We can't do it without YOU.

name: Artery Pavilion
description: The ARTery is the headquarters of the Burning Man Art Department on playa, located at 6:30 and Esplanade. It functions as a check-in center for artists, as well as a hub for information about art.

name: aNice camp
description: Anice camp is simply the nicest camp in town. This year, find us out in the deep deeeeeep deeeeep playa to hitch a ride on our infamous taxi "The Dusty Cab"!. We are BRC's finest taxi stand offering rides every sunrise and sunset.

name: Moop Map Hq
description: MOOP Map HQ: Headquarters of The Playa Restoration All-Star Team and the MOOP Map! LEAVE NO TRACE!

name: Ass Stamp Camp
description: Need a temporary reminder of your time at Burning Man? Stop by the Gigsville bar in the afternoons for the year off version of Ass Stamp Camp. Everyone loves a stamp on the ass(21+). Have a cup of tea (and dish some!) with Grandma Geo while supplies last. The Gigsville bar is great place to hang out. It's historical! Burning Man is that old!

name: Millions of Cats
description: Come one and all to Millions of Cats, where we enjoy Bloody Mary's, Nail Guns, Jalapenos,  Meat, and Midnight S-Mores.

name: BLM/FNW Interpretive Camp
description: n/a

name: LE Substation
description: BLM Law Enforcement Substation

name: Ancestry
description: art support for ancestry and mama jelly

name: Rainbow FREAKALEEKS
description: Creators of The Promise of the Decade. Come say hello!

name: The Phoenix Camp
description:
The Phoenix Camp - the camp of the active Ukrainian artistic community, which brought the installation "Phoenix". The project reflects the current narrative of the Ukrainian context now about the revival of freedoms and rights of man and all living things. In the camp, we will gladly meet everyone who wants to talk about art, life, love, the world in general and Ukraine in particular. Also, we will be happy to communicate with the artistic team of various projects and exchange experience.
We will wait for the meeting!

name: The Fox Hole
description: Come visit the Fox Hall where the Uncouth Lark art collective will be building a temporary home. Here the harrowing "tails" of how we built our winter fox for the playa. Ask us all the questions.

name: Whomp Wagon
description: The Whomp Wagon, Jimmy's origins are sketchy. Legend has it that he was the main ride used by the most popular beat boys of the 1800's. Both DJ's, Lewis and Clark have been rumored to travel from settlement to settlement disrupting society with loud music. Jimmy eventually died of dysentery and the wagon was lost for years! Historians say the trail ended somewhere deep in the Nevada desert! THE WHOMP IS BORN, Found in the deep playa under a cloud of Dust, Dirty Beats & Lasers The Whomp Wagon was born! THE FUTURE The Whomp Crew now pushes our journey into the future with one inclusive vision: To create a platform where musicians of all genres can perform and share their gift for everyone. Burning Man changed our lives for the better and forever! The Whomp Wagon is our gift to Burning Man!

name: Playa Pete's Plaza
description: Playa Pete's Plaza. Home port for PV Monaco and sundry mutant vehicles.

name: 404: Village Not Found Annex
description:
404: Village Not Found-Come here to get lost.
A visually rich and unique village with a long history, 404 is home to Death Before Decaf, Dye With Dignity, M*A*S*H 4207th, Pottie Project, and Horseshoes and Handgrenades. A diverse and welcoming environment, you can find something fun 24 hours a day here. Watch a movie, play some games, grab a coffee, dye a scarf, eat a snow cone, drink the best martini on the playa, eat some pancakes, run a security checkpoint, learn about grey water evaporation or the importance of toilet access worldwide, or just find a place you didn't realize you really needed to be until you got there.

name: Airpusher Collective
description: Airpusher Collective brings our iconic Steampunk Airship to the playa every year.   We celebrate love, art and music. This collective of visionaries believes in the power of community and creativity, of collaboration and inclusion, of fun and silliness. Our passion lies in creating memorable experiences with our art and music. You can find us creating and celebrating on the Playa, at our home-grown parties in San Francisco like the Steampunk Masquerade or more intimately at our monthly FlyBy Happy Hours.

name: Artech
description: #Vagr art support camp

name: Panda Camp
description: Panda Camp - Home of the fun loving Pandas who have an Electronicopter.

name: Udon It!?
description:
Support camp for : Udon It!? - Wishing Shrine and Tea House

The Udon It!? Shrine is an homage to silliness and respect for all things Noodley! We believe in the wisdom of the noodle, to teach us how to dance, to improvise, and to connect us all like the infinite loops of our universe. Like the Oroborus snake that eats it's own tale, and the infinity symbol (noodle) that eternally returns us from dust to dust. Udon it!? is a place to make dreams to smiling cats, to imagine in anime, and ask yourself Udon it? while simultaneously affirming that - Udon it!
